firePunch.name: firePunch
firePunch.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to burn the target.
firePunch.flavorText:
The foe is punched
with a fiery fist.
It may leave the
target with a burn.

pound.name: pound
pound.flavorText:
The foe is physically
pounded with a long
tail or a foreleg,
etc.

karateChop.name: karateChop
karateChop.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  User's critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move.
karateChop.flavorText:
The foe is attacked
with a sharp chop.
It has a high
critical-hit ratio.

doubleSlap.name: doubleSlap
doubleSlap.effectText:
Inflicts regular damage.  Hits 2–5 times in one turn.

Has a 3/8 chance each to hit 2 or 3 times, and a 1/8 chance each to hit 4 or 5 times.  Averages to 3 hits per use.
doubleSlap.flavorText:
The foe is slapped
repeatedly, back
and forth, two to
five times in a row.

cometPunch.name: cometPunch
cometPunch.effectText:
Inflicts regular damage.  Hits 2–5 times in one turn.

Has a 3/8 chance each to hit 2 or 3 times, and a 1/8 chance each to hit 4 or 5 times.  Averages to 3 hits per use.
cometPunch.flavorText:
The foe is hit with
a flurry of punches
that strike two to
five times in a row.

payDay.name: payDay
payDay.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  After the battle ends, the winner receives five times the user's level in extra money for each time this move was used.
payDay.flavorText:
Numerous coins are
hurled at the foe to
inflict damage.
Money is earned
after battle.

guillotine.name: guillotine
guillotine.effectText:
Inflicts damage equal to the target's max HP.  Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.  This move's accuracy is 30% plus 1% for each level the user is higher than the target.  If the user is a lower level than the target, this move will fail.

Because this move inflicts a specific and finite amount of damage, endure still prevents the target from fainting.

The effects of lock on, mind reader, and no guard still apply, as long as the user is equal or higher level than the target.  However, they will not give this move a chance to break through detect or protect.
guillotine.flavorText:
A vicious, tearing
attack with pincers.
The foe will faint
instantly if this
attack hits.

megaPunch.name: megaPunch
megaPunch.flavorText:
The foe is slugged
by a punch thrown
with muscle-packed
power.

swordsDance.name: swordsDance
swordsDance.effectText: Raises the user's Attack by two stages.
swordsDance.flavorText:
A frenetic dance to
uplift the fighting
spirit. It sharply
raises the user’s
Attack stat.

vineWhip.name: vineWhip
vineWhip.flavorText:
The foe is struck
with slender, whiplike
vines to inflict
damage.

fly.name: fly
fly.effectText:
Inflicts regular damage.  User flies high into the air for one turn, becoming immune to attack, and hits on the second turn.

During the immune turn, gust, hurricane, sky uppercut, smack down, thunder, twister, and whirlwind still hit the user normally.  gust and twister also have double power against the user.

The damage from hail and sandstorm still applies during the immune turn.

The user may be hit during its immune turn if under the effect of lock on, mind reader, or no guard.

This move cannot be used while gravity is in effect.

This move cannot be selected by sleep talk.
fly.flavorText:
The user soars, then
strikes on the second
turn. It can also be
used for flying to
any familiar town.

slam.name: slam
slam.flavorText:
The foe is slammed
with a long tail,
vines, etc., to inflict
damage.

doubleKick.name: doubleKick
doubleKick.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Hits twice in one turn.
doubleKick.flavorText:
The foe is quickly
kicked twice in
succession using both
feet.

thunderPunch.name: thunderPunch
thunderPunch.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to paralyze the target.
thunderPunch.flavorText:
The foe is punched
with an electrified
fist. It may leave
the target with
paralysis.

icePunch.name: icePunch
icePunch.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to freeze the target.
icePunch.flavorText:
The foe is punched
with an icy fist.
It may leave the
target frozen.

cut.name: cut
cut.flavorText:
The foe is cut with a
scythe or a claw.
It can also be used
to cut down thin
trees.

bind.name: bind
bind.effectText:
Inflicts regular damage.  For the next 2–5 turns, the target cannot leave the field and is damaged for 1/16 its max HP at the end of each turn.  The user continues to use other moves during this time.  If the user leaves the field, this effect ends.

Has a 3/8 chance each to hit 2 or 3 times, and a 1/8 chance each to hit 4 or 5 times.  Averages to 3 hits per use.

rapid spin cancels this effect.
bind.flavorText:
A long body or
tentacles are used
to bind and squeeze
the foe for two to
five turns.

scratch.name: scratch
scratch.flavorText:
Hard, pointed, and
sharp claws rake the
foe to inflict damage.

stomp.name: stomp
stomp.effectText:
Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to make the target flinch.

Power is doubled against Pokémon that have used minimize since entering the field.
stomp.flavorText:
The foe is stomped
with a big foot.
It may also make the
target flinch.

whirlwind.name: whirlwind
whirlwind.effectText:
Switches the target out for another of its trainer's Pokémon selected at random.  Wild battles end immediately.

Doesn't affect Pokémon with suction cups or under the effect of ingrain.
whirlwind.flavorText:
The foe is blown away,
to be replaced by
another Pokémon
in its party. In the
wild, the battle ends.

wingAttack.name: wingAttack
wingAttack.flavorText:
The foe is struck
with large, imposing
wings spread wide
to inflict damage.

rollingKick.name: rollingKick
rollingKick.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to make the target flinch.
rollingKick.flavorText:
The user cuts a
quick spin and lashes
out with a sharp
kick.

jumpKick.name: jumpKick
jumpKick.effectText:
Inflicts regular damage.  If this move misses, is blocked by protect or detect, or has no effect, the user takes half the damage it would have inflicted in recoil.  This recoil damage will not exceed half the user's max HP.

This move cannot be used while gravity is in effect.
jumpKick.flavorText:
The user jumps up
high, then strikes
with a kick. If the
kick misses, the
user hurts itself.

poisonSting.name: poisonSting
poisonSting.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to poison the target.
poisonSting.flavorText:
The foe is stabbed
with a poisonous
barb of some sort.
It may also poison
the target.

gust.name: gust
gust.effectText:
Inflicts regular damage.

If the target is under the effect of bounce, fly, or sky drop, this move will hit with double power.
gust.flavorText:
A gust of wind is
whipped up by wings
and launched at the
foe to inflict damage.

growl.name: growl
growl.effectText: Lowers the target's Attack by one stage.
growl.flavorText:
The user growls in an
endearing way, making
the foe less wary.
The target’s Attack
stat is lowered.

supersonic.name: supersonic
supersonic.flavorText:
The user generates
odd sound waves from
its body.
It may confuse the
target.

disable.name: disable
disable.effectText: Disables the target's last used move, preventing its use for 4–7 turns, selected at random, or until the target leaves the field.  If the target hasn't used a move since entering the field, if it tried to use a move this turn and failed,  if its last used move has 0 PP remaining, or if it already has a move disabled, this move will fail.
disable.flavorText:
For several turns,
this move prevents
the foe from using
the move it last
used.

razorWind.name: razorWind
razorWind.effectText:
Inflicts regular damage.  User's critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move.  User charges for one turn before attacking.

This move cannot be selected by sleep talk.
razorWind.flavorText:
A two-turn attack.
Blades of wind hit the
foe on the second
turn. It has a high
critical-hit ratio.

tackle.name: tackle
tackle.flavorText:
A physical attack
in which the user
charges and slams
into the foe with
its whole body.

mist.name: mist
mist.effectText:
Pokémon on the user's side of the field are immune to stat-lowering effects for five turns.

guard swap, heart swap, and power swap may still be used.

defog used by an opponent will end this effect.
mist.flavorText:
The user cloaks its
body with a white mist
that prevents any of
its stats from being
cut for five turns.

psybeam.name: psybeam
psybeam.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to confuse the target.
psybeam.flavorText:
The foe is attacked
with a peculiar ray.
It may also leave the
target confused.

bodySlam.name: bodySlam
bodySlam.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to paralyze the target.
bodySlam.flavorText:
The user drops onto
the foe with its full
body weight.
It may leave the foe
paralyzed.

auroraBeam.name: auroraBeam
auroraBeam.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to lower the target's Attack by one stage.
auroraBeam.flavorText:
The foe is hit with a
rainbow-colored beam.
It may also lower the
target’s Attack
stat.

thrash.name: thrash
thrash.effectText:
Inflicts regular damage.  User is forced to attack with this move for 2–3 turns,selected at random.  After the last hit, the user becomes confused.

safeguard does not protect against the confusion from this move.
thrash.flavorText:
The user rampages
and attacks for two
to three turns.
It then becomes
confused, however.

viceGrip.name: viceGrip
viceGrip.flavorText:
Huge, impressive
pincers grip and
squeeze the foe.

megaKick.name: megaKick
megaKick.flavorText:
The foe is attacked
by a kick launched
with muscle-packed
power.

sonicBoom.name: sonicBoom
sonicBoom.flavorText:
The foe is hit with a
destructive shock
wave that always
inflicts 20 HP damage.

petalDance.name: petalDance
petalDance.effectText:
Inflicts regular damage.  User is forced to attack with this move for 2–3 turns,selected at random.  After the last hit, the user becomes confused.

safeguard does not protect against the confusion from this move.
petalDance.flavorText:
The user attacks by
scattering petals for
two to three turns.
The user then
becomes confused.

hornDrill.name: hornDrill
hornDrill.effectText:
Inflicts damage equal to the target's max HP.  Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.  This move's accuracy is 30% plus 1% for each level the user is higher than the target.  If the user is a lower level than the target, this move will fail.

Because this move inflicts a specific and finite amount of damage, endure still prevents the target from fainting.

The effects of lock on, mind reader, and no guard still apply, as long as the user is equal or higher level than the target.  However, they will not give this move a chance to break through detect or protect.
hornDrill.flavorText:
The foe is stabbed
with a horn rotating
like a drill.
The foe instantly
faints if it hits.

ember.name: ember
ember.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to burn the target.
ember.flavorText:
The foe is attacked
with small flames.
The target may also
be left with a burn.

bite.name: bite
bite.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to make the target flinch.
bite.flavorText:
The foe is bitten with
viciously sharp fangs.
It may make the
target flinch.

surf.name: surf
surf.effectText:
Inflicts regular damage.

If the target is in the first turn of dive, this move will hit with double power.
surf.flavorText:
It swamps the entire
battlefield with a
giant wave.
It can also be used
for crossing water.

submission.name: submission
submission.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  User takes 1/4 the damage it inflicts in recoil.
submission.flavorText:
The user grabs the
foe and recklessly
dives for the ground.
It also hurts the
user slightly.

leechSeed.name: leechSeed
leechSeed.effectText:
Plants a seed on the target that drains 1/8 of its max HP at the end of every turn and heals the user for the amount taken.  Has no effect on grass Pokémon.  The seed remains until the target leaves the field.

The user takes damage instead of being healed if the target has liquid ooze.

rapid spin will remove this effect.

This effect is passed on by baton pass.
leechSeed.flavorText:
A seed is planted on
the foe. It steals
some HP from the foe
to heal the user on
every turn.

leer.name: leer
leer.effectText: Lowers the target's Defense by one stage.
leer.flavorText:
The foe is given an
intimidating leer with
sharp eyes.
The target’s Defense
stat is reduced.

doubleEdge.name: doubleEdge
doubleEdge.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  User takes 1/3 the damage it inflicts in recoil.
doubleEdge.flavorText:
A reckless, life-
risking tackle.
It also damages the
user by a fairly large
amount, however.

tailWhip.name: tailWhip
tailWhip.effectText: Lowers the target's Defense by one stage.
tailWhip.flavorText:
The user wags its tail
cutely, making the
foe less wary.
The target’s Defense
stat is lowered.

waterGun.name: waterGun
waterGun.flavorText:
The foe is blasted
with a forceful shot
of water.

blizzard.name: blizzard
blizzard.effectText:
Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to freeze the target.

During hail, this move has 100% accuracy.  It also has a (100 - accuracy)% chance to break through the protection of protect and detect.
blizzard.flavorText:
A howling blizzard is
summoned to strike
the foe.
It may also freeze
the target solid.

poisonPowder.name: poisonPowder
poisonPowder.flavorText:
A cloud of poisonous
dust is scattered on
the foe.
It may poison the
target.

stringShot.name: stringShot
stringShot.effectText: Lowers the target's Speed by two stages.
stringShot.flavorText:
The foe is bound with
silk blown from the
user’s mouth.
It reduces the
target’s Speed stat.

bubbleBeam.name: bubbleBeam
bubbleBeam.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to lower the target's Speed by one stage.
bubbleBeam.flavorText:
A spray of bubbles is
forcefully ejected
at the foe.
It may also lower the
target’s Speed stat.

megaDrain.name: megaDrain
megaDrain.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.
megaDrain.flavorText:
A nutrient-draining
attack. The user’s
HP is restored by
half the damage taken
by the target.

takeDown.name: takeDown
takeDown.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  User takes 1/4 the damage it inflicts in recoil.
takeDown.flavorText:
A reckless, full-body
charge attack for
slamming into the foe.
It also damages the
user a little.

wrap.name: wrap
wrap.effectText:
Inflicts regular damage.  For the next 2–5 turns, the target cannot leave the field and is damaged for 1/16 its max HP at the end of each turn.  The user continues to use other moves during this time.  If the user leaves the field, this effect ends.

Has a 3/8 chance each to hit 2 or 3 times, and a 1/8 chance each to hit 4 or 5 times.  Averages to 3 hits per use.

rapid spin cancels this effect.
wrap.flavorText:
A long body or vines
are used to wrap and
squeeze the foe for
two to five turns.

drillPeck.name: drillPeck
drillPeck.flavorText:
A corkscrewing
attack with the
sharp beak acting
as a drill.

pinMissile.name: pinMissile
pinMissile.effectText:
Inflicts regular damage.  Hits 2–5 times in one turn.

Has a 3/8 chance each to hit 2 or 3 times, and a 1/8 chance each to hit 4 or 5 times.  Averages to 3 hits per use.
pinMissile.flavorText:
Sharp pins are shot
at the foe in rapid
succession.
They hit two to five
times in a row.

roar.name: roar
roar.effectText:
Switches the target out for another of its trainer's Pokémon selected at random.  Wild battles end immediately.

Doesn't affect Pokémon with suction cups or under the effect of ingrain.
roar.flavorText:
The foe is scared off,
to be replaced by
another Pokémon in
its party. In the
wild, the battle ends.

razorLeaf.name: razorLeaf
razorLeaf.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  User's critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move.
razorLeaf.flavorText:
Sharp-edged leaves
are launched to slash
at the foe. It has a
high critical-hit
ratio.

fireSpin.name: fireSpin
fireSpin.effectText:
Inflicts regular damage.  For the next 2–5 turns, the target cannot leave the field and is damaged for 1/16 its max HP at the end of each turn.  The user continues to use other moves during this time.  If the user leaves the field, this effect ends.

Has a 3/8 chance each to hit 2 or 3 times, and a 1/8 chance each to hit 4 or 5 times.  Averages to 3 hits per use.

rapid spin cancels this effect.
fireSpin.flavorText:
The foe becomes
trapped within a
fierce vortex of fire
that rages for two
to five turns.

lowKick.name: lowKick
lowKick.effectText:
Inflicts regular damage.  Power increases with the target's weight in kilograms, to a maximum of 120.

Target's weight | Power
--------------- | ----:
Up to 10kg      |    20
Up to 25kg      |    40
Up to 50kg      |    60
Up to 100kg     |    80
Up to 200kg     |   100
Above 200kg     |   120
lowKick.flavorText:
A powerful low kick
that makes the foe
fall over. It inflicts
greater damage on
heavier foes.

growth.name: growth
growth.effectText: Raises the user's Attack and Special Attack by one stage each.  During sunny day, raises both stats by two stages.
growth.flavorText:
The user’s body is
forced to grow all at
once. It raises the
Sp. Atk stat.

sleepPowder.name: sleepPowder
sleepPowder.flavorText:
The user scatters a
big cloud of sleep-
inducing dust around
the foe.

sandAttack.name: sandAttack
sandAttack.effectText: Lowers the target's accuracy by one stage.
sandAttack.flavorText:
Sand is hurled in the
foe’s face, reducing
its accuracy.

counter.name: counter
counter.effectText:
Targets the last opposing Pokémon to hit the user with a physical move this turn.  Inflicts twice the damage that move did to the user.  If there is no eligible target, this move will fail.  Type immunity applies, but other type effects are ignored.

This move cannot be copied by mirror move, nor selected by assist or metronome.
counter.flavorText:
A retaliation move
that counters any
physical attack,
inflicting double the
damage taken.

peck.name: peck
peck.flavorText:
The foe is jabbed
with a sharply
pointed beak or
horn.

stunSpore.name: stunSpore
stunSpore.flavorText:
The user scatters a
cloud of paralyzing
powder.
It may paralyze the
target.

twineedle.name: twineedle
twineedle.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Hits twice in the same turn.  Has a $effectChance% chance to poison the target.
twineedle.flavorText:
The foe is stabbed
twice by a pair of
stingers.
It may also poison
the target.

flamethrower.name: flamethrower
flamethrower.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to burn the target.
flamethrower.flavorText:
The foe is scorched
with an intense blast
of fire. The target
may also be left with
a burn.

furyAttack.name: furyAttack
furyAttack.effectText:
Inflicts regular damage.  Hits 2–5 times in one turn.

Has a 3/8 chance each to hit 2 or 3 times, and a 1/8 chance each to hit 4 or 5 times.  Averages to 3 hits per use.
furyAttack.flavorText:
The foe is jabbed
repeatedly with a
horn or beak two to
five times in a row.

absorb.name: absorb
absorb.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.
absorb.flavorText:
A nutrient-draining
attack. The user’s
HP is restored by
half the damage taken
by the target.

seismicToss.name: seismicToss
seismicToss.effectText: Inflicts damage equal to the user's level.  Type immunity applies, but other type effects are ignored.
seismicToss.flavorText:
The foe is thrown
using the power of
gravity. It inflicts
damage equal to
the user’s level.

sing.name: sing
sing.flavorText:
A soothing lullaby is
sung in a calming
voice that puts the
foe into a deep
slumber.

thunder.name: thunder
thunder.effectText:
Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to paralyze the target.

During rain dance, this move has 100% accuracy.  It also has a (100 - accuracy)% chance to break through the protection of protect and detect.

During sunny day, this move has 50% accuracy.
thunder.flavorText:
A wicked thunderbolt
is dropped on the foe
to inflict damage.
It may also leave the
target paralyzed.

fissure.name: fissure
fissure.effectText:
Inflicts damage equal to the target's max HP.  Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.  This move's accuracy is 30% plus 1% for each level the user is higher than the target.  If the user is a lower level than the target, this move will fail.

Because this move inflicts a specific and finite amount of damage, endure still prevents the target from fainting.

The effects of lock on, mind reader, and no guard still apply, as long as the user is equal or higher level than the target.  However, they will not give this move a chance to break through detect or protect.
fissure.flavorText:
The user opens up a
fissure in the ground
and drops the foe in.
The target instantly
faints if it hits.

psychic.name: psychic
psychic.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by one stage.
psychic.flavorText:
The foe is hit by a
strong telekinetic
force. It may also
reduce the foe’s
Sp. Def stat.

confusion.name: confusion
confusion.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to confuse the target.
confusion.flavorText:
The foe is hit by a
weak telekinetic
force. It may also
leave the foe
confused.

mimic.name: mimic
mimic.effectText:
This move is replaced by the target's last successfully used move, and its PP changes to 5.  If the target hasn't used a move since entering the field, if it tried to use a move this turn and failed, or if the user already knows the targeted move, this move will fail.  This effect vanishes when the user leaves the field.

If chatter, metronome, mimic, sketch, or struggle is selected, this move will fail.

This move cannot be copied by mirror move, nor selected by assist or metronome, nor forced by encore.
mimic.flavorText:
The user copies the
move last used by
the foe. The move can
be used for the rest
of the battle.

sludge.name: sludge
sludge.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to poison the target.
sludge.flavorText:
Unsanitary sludge is
hurled at the foe.
It may also poison
the target.

metronome.name: metronome
metronome.effectText:
Selects any move at random and uses it.  Moves the user already knows are not eligible.  Assist, meta, protection, and reflection moves are also not eligible; specifically, assist, chatter, copycat, counter, covet, destiny bond, detect, endure, feint, focus punch, follow me, helping hand, me first, metronome, mimic, mirror coat, mirror move, protect, quick guard, sketch, sleep talk, snatch, struggle, switcheroo, thief, trick, and wide guard will not be selected by this move.

This move cannot be copied by mimic or mirror move, nor selected by assist, metronome, or sleep talk.
metronome.flavorText:
The user waggles a
finger and stimulates
the brain into
randomly using nearly
any move.

harden.name: harden
harden.effectText: Raises the user's Defense by one stage.
harden.flavorText:
The user stiffens all
the muscles in its
body to raise its
Defense stat.

teleport.name: teleport
teleport.effectText: Does nothing.  Wild battles end immediately.
teleport.flavorText:
Use it to flee from
any wild Pokémon.
It may also be used
to warp to the last
Poké Center visited.

toxic.name: toxic
toxic.effectText: Badly poisons the target.  Never misses when used by a poison-type Pokémon.
toxic.flavorText:
A move that leaves
the target badly
poisoned.
Its poison damage
worsens every turn.

solarBeam.name: solarBeam
solarBeam.effectText:
Inflicts regular damage.  User charges for one turn before attacking.

During sunny day, the charge turn is skipped.

During hail, rain dance, or sandstorm, power is halved.

This move cannot be selected by sleep talk.
solarBeam.flavorText:
A two-turn attack.
The user gathers
light, then blasts a
bundled beam on the
second turn.

rage.name: rage
rage.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Every time the user is hit after it uses this move but before its next action, its Attack raises by one stage.
rage.flavorText:
While this move is in
use, it gains attack
power each time the
user is hit in battle.

quickAttack.name: quickAttack
quickAttack.flavorText:
The user lunges at
the foe at a speed
that makes it almost
invisible. It is sure
to strike first.

kinesis.name: kinesis
kinesis.effectText: Lowers the target's accuracy by one stage.
kinesis.flavorText:
The user distracts
the foe by bending a
spoon.
It may lower the
target’s accuracy.

doubleTeam.name: doubleTeam
doubleTeam.effectText: Raises the user's evasion by one stage.
doubleTeam.flavorText:
By moving rapidly, the
user makes illusory
copies of itself to
raise its evasiveness.

nightShade.name: nightShade
nightShade.effectText: Inflicts damage equal to the user's level.  Type immunity applies, but other type effects are ignored.
nightShade.flavorText:
The user makes the
foe see a mirage.
It inflicts damage
matching the user’s
level.

lick.name: lick
lick.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to paralyze the target.
lick.flavorText:
The foe is licked with
a long tongue, causing
damage.
It may also paralyze
the target.

hyperBeam.name: hyperBeam
hyperBeam.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  User loses its next turn to "recharge", and cannot attack or switch out during that turn.
hyperBeam.flavorText:
The foe is attacked
with a powerful beam.
The user must rest
on the next turn to
regain its energy.

headbutt.name: headbutt
headbutt.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to make the target flinch.
headbutt.flavorText:
The user sticks its
head out and rams
straight forward.
It may make the
foe flinch.

mirrorMove.name: mirrorMove
mirrorMove.effectText:
Uses the last move targeted at the user by a Pokémon still on the field.  A move counts as targeting the user even if it hit multiple Pokémon, as long as the user was one of them; however, moves targeting the field itself do not count.  If the user has not been targeted by an appropriate move since entering the field, or if no Pokémon that targeted the user remains on the field, this move will fail.

Moves that failed, missed, had no effect, or were blocked are still copied.

Assist moves, time-delayed moves, “meta” moves that operate on other moves/Pokémon/abilities, and some other special moves cannot be copied and are ignored; if the last move to hit the user was such a move, the previous move will be used instead.  The full list of ignored moves is: acid armor, acupressure, after you, agility, ally switch, amnesia, aqua ring, aromatherapy, aromatic mist, assist, autotomize, barrier, baton pass, belch, belly drum, bide, bulk up, calm mind, camouflage, celebrate, charge, coil, conversion, conversion 2, copycat, cosmic power, cotton guard, counter, crafty shield, curse, defend order, defense curl, destiny bond, detect, doom desire, double team, dragon dance, electric terrain, endure, final gambit, flower shield, focus energy, focus punch, follow me, future sight, geomancy, grassy terrain, gravity, growth, grudge, guard split, hail, happy hour, harden, haze, heal bell, heal order, heal pulse, healing wish, helping hand, hold hands, hone claws, howl, imprison, ingrain, ion deluge, iron defense, kings shield, light screen, lucky chant, lunar dance, magic coat, magnet rise, magnetic flux, mat block, me first, meditate, metronome, milk drink, mimic, minimize, mirror coat, mirror move, mist, misty terrain, moonlight, morning sun, mud sport, nasty plot, nature power, perish song, power split, power trick, protect, psych up, quick guard, quiver dance, rage powder, rain dance, recover, recycle, reflect, reflect type, refresh, rest, rock polish, role play, roost, rototiller, safeguard, sandstorm, shadow blast, shadow bolt, shadow half, shadow rush, shadow shed, shadow sky, shadow storm, shadow wave, sharpen, shell smash, shift gear, sketch, slack off, sleep talk, snatch, soft boiled, spikes, spiky shield, spit up, splash, stealth rock, sticky web, stockpile, struggle, substitute, sunny day, swallow, swords dance, synthesis, tail glow, tailwind, teleport, toxic spikes, transform, water sport, wide guard, wish, withdraw and work up.

This move cannot be selected by assist, metronome, or sleep talk, nor forced by encore.
mirrorMove.flavorText:
The user counters
the foe by mimicking
the move last used
by the foe.

minimize.name: minimize
minimize.effectText:
Raises the user's evasion by two stages.

stomp and steamroller have double power against Pokémon that have used this move since entering the field.
minimize.flavorText:
The user compresses
its body to make
itself look smaller.
The user’s evasion
stat is boosted.

rockThrow.name: rockThrow
rockThrow.flavorText:
The user picks up
and throws a small
rock at the foe to
attack.

iceBeam.name: iceBeam
iceBeam.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to freeze the target.
iceBeam.flavorText:
The foe is struck
with an icy-cold
beam of energy.
It may also freeze
the target solid.

hypnosis.name: hypnosis
hypnosis.flavorText:
The user employs
hypnotic suggestion
to make the target
fall into a deep
sleep.

dragonRage.name: dragonRage
dragonRage.flavorText:
The foe is stricken
by a shock wave.
This attack always
inflicts 40 HP
damage.

hydroPump.name: hydroPump
hydroPump.flavorText:
The foe is blasted by
a huge volume of
water launched under
great pressure.

reflect.name: reflect
reflect.effectText:
Erects a barrier around the user's side of the field that reduces damage from physical attacks by half for five turns.  In double battles, the reduction is 1/3.  Critical hits are not affected by the barrier.

If the user is holding light clay, the barrier lasts for eight turns.

brick break or defog used by an opponent will destroy the barrier.
reflect.flavorText:
A wondrous wall of
light is put up to
suppress damage from
physical attacks for
five turns.

earthquake.name: earthquake
earthquake.effectText:
Inflicts regular damage.

If the target is in the first turn of dig, this move will hit with double power.
earthquake.flavorText:
The user sets off an
earthquake that hits
all the Pokémon in
the battle.

softBoiled.name: softBoiled
softBoiled.effectText: Heals the user for half its max HP.
softBoiled.flavorText:
The user restores its
own HP by up to half
of its maximum HP.
It may also be used
to heal an ally’s HP.

bide.name: bide
bide.effectText:
User waits for two turns.  On the second turn, the user inflicts twice the damage it accumulated on the last Pokémon to hit it.  Damage inflicted is typeless.

This move cannot be selected by sleep talk.
bide.flavorText:
The user endures
attacks for two
turns, then strikes
back to cause double
the damage taken.

withdraw.name: withdraw
withdraw.effectText: Raises the user's Defense by one stage.
withdraw.flavorText:
The user withdraws
its body into its hard
shell, raising its
Defense stat.

amnesia.name: amnesia
amnesia.effectText: Raises the user's Special Defense by two stages.
amnesia.flavorText:
The user temporarily
empties its mind to
forget its concerns.
It sharply raises the
user’s Sp. Def stat.

clamp.name: clamp
clamp.effectText:
Inflicts regular damage.  For the next 2–5 turns, the target cannot leave the field and is damaged for 1/16 its max HP at the end of each turn.  The user continues to use other moves during this time.  If the user leaves the field, this effect ends.

Has a 3/8 chance each to hit 2 or 3 times, and a 1/8 chance each to hit 4 or 5 times.  Averages to 3 hits per use.

rapid spin cancels this effect.
clamp.flavorText:
The foe is clamped
and squeezed by
the user’s very thick
and sturdy shell for
two to five turns.

waterfall.name: waterfall
waterfall.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to make the target flinch.
waterfall.flavorText:
The user charges the
foe at an awesome
speed.
It can also be used
to climb a waterfall.

highJumpKick.name: highJumpKick
highJumpKick.effectText:
Inflicts regular damage.  If this move misses, is blocked by protect or detect, or has no effect, the user takes half the damage it would have inflicted in recoil.  This recoil damage will not exceed half the user's max HP.

This move cannot be used while gravity is in effect.
highJumpKick.flavorText:
The foe is attacked
with a knee kick from
a jump. If it misses,
the user is hurt
instead.

thunderbolt.name: thunderbolt
thunderbolt.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to paralyze the target.
thunderbolt.flavorText:
A strong electric
blast is loosed at
the foe.
It may also leave the
foe paralyzed.

smog.name: smog
smog.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to poison the target.
smog.flavorText:
The foe is attacked
with a discharge of
filthy gases.
It may also poison
the target.

spikeCannon.name: spikeCannon
spikeCannon.effectText:
Inflicts regular damage.  Hits 2–5 times in one turn.

Has a 3/8 chance each to hit 2 or 3 times, and a 1/8 chance each to hit 4 or 5 times.  Averages to 3 hits per use.
spikeCannon.flavorText:
Sharp spikes are
fired at the foe to
strike two to five
times in rapid
succession.

meditate.name: meditate
meditate.effectText: Raises the user's Attack by one stage.
meditate.flavorText:
The user meditates
to awaken the power
deep within its body
and raise its Attack
stat.

dig.name: dig
dig.effectText:
Inflicts regular damage.  User digs underground for one turn, becoming immune to attack, and hits on the second turn.

During the immune turn, earthquake, fissure, and magnitude still hit the user normally, and their power is doubled if appropriate.

The user may be hit during its immune turn if under the effect of lock on, mind reader, or no guard.

This move cannot be selected by sleep talk.
dig.flavorText:
The user burrows,
then attacks on the
second turn.
It can also be used
to exit dungeons.

haze.name: haze
haze.effectText:
Removes stat, accuracy, and evasion modifiers from every Pokémon on the field.

This does not count as a stat reduction for the purposes of clear body or white smoke.
haze.flavorText:
The user creates a
haze that eliminates
every stat change
among all the Pokémon
engaged in battle.

acid.name: acid
acid.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by one stage.
acid.flavorText:
The foe is attacked
with a spray of harsh
acid. It may also
lower the target’s
Sp. Def stat.

strength.name: strength
strength.flavorText:
The foe is slugged
with a punch thrown
at maximum power.
It can also be used
to move boulders.

hornAttack.name: hornAttack
hornAttack.flavorText:
The foe is jabbed
with a sharply
pointed horn to
inflict damage.

swift.name: swift
swift.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.
swift.flavorText:
Star-shaped rays are
shot at the foe.
This attack never
misses.

boneClub.name: boneClub
boneClub.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to make the target flinch.
boneClub.flavorText:
The user clubs the
foe with a bone.
It may also make the
target flinch.

confuseRay.name: confuseRay
confuseRay.flavorText:
The foe is exposed
to a sinister ray
that triggers
confusion.

eggBomb.name: eggBomb
eggBomb.flavorText:
A large egg is hurled
with maximum force at
the foe to inflict
damage.

skullBash.name: skullBash
skullBash.effectText:
Inflicts regular damage.  Raises the user's Defense by one stage.  User then charges for one turn before attacking.

This move cannot be selected by sleep talk.
skullBash.flavorText:
The user tucks in its
head to raise its
Defense in the first
turn, then rams the
foe on the next turn.

constrict.name: constrict
constrict.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to lower the target's Speed by one stage.
constrict.flavorText:
The foe is attacked
with long, creeping
tentacles or vines.
It may also lower the
target’s Speed.

thunderShock.name: thunderShock
thunderShock.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to paralyze the target.
thunderShock.flavorText:
A jolt of electricity
is hurled at the foe
to inflict damage.
It may also leave the
foe paralyzed.

selfDestruct.name: selfDestruct
selfDestruct.effectText: User faints, even if the attack fails or misses.  Inflicts regular damage.
selfDestruct.flavorText:
The user blows up to
inflict damage on all
Pokémon in battle.
The user faints upon
using this move.

thunderWave.name: thunderWave
thunderWave.flavorText:
A weak electric
charge is launched at
the foe.
It causes paralysis if
it hits.

screech.name: screech
screech.effectText: Lowers the target's Defense by two stages.
screech.flavorText:
An earsplitting
screech is emitted to
sharply reduce the
foe’s Defense stat.

recover.name: recover
recover.effectText: Heals the user for half its max HP.
recover.flavorText:
A self-healing move.
The user restores its
own HP by up to half
of its max HP.

defenseCurl.name: defenseCurl
defenseCurl.effectText:
Raises user's Defense by one stage.

After this move is used, the power of ice ball and rollout are doubled until the user leaves the field.
defenseCurl.flavorText:
The user curls up to
conceal weak spots
and raise its Defense
stat.

smokescreen.name: smokescreen
smokescreen.effectText: Lowers the target's accuracy by one stage.
smokescreen.flavorText:
The user releases an
obscuring cloud of
smoke or ink.
It reduces the foe’s
accuracy.

barrier.name: barrier
barrier.effectText: Raises the user's Defense by two stages.
barrier.flavorText:
The user throws up a
sturdy wall that
sharply raises its
Defense stat.

sketch.name: sketch
sketch.effectText:
Permanently replaces itself with the target's last used move.  If that move is chatter or struggle, this move will fail.

This move cannot be copied by mimic or mirror move, nor selected by assist or metronome, nor forced by encore.
sketch.flavorText:
It enables the user
to learn a move used
by the foe.
Once used, the move
Sketch disappears.

bonemerang.name: bonemerang
bonemerang.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Hits twice in one turn.
bonemerang.flavorText:
The user throws the
bone it holds. The
bone loops to hit the
foe twice, coming and
going.

focusEnergy.name: focusEnergy
focusEnergy.effectText:
User's critical hit rate is two levels higher until it leaves the field.  If the user has already used focus energy since entering the field, this move will fail.

This effect is passed on by baton pass.
focusEnergy.flavorText:
The user takes a
deep breath and
focuses to raise the
critical-hit ratio of
its attacks.

rest.name: rest
rest.effectText:
User falls to sleep and immediately regains all its HP.  If the user has another major status effect, sleep will replace it.  The user will always wake up after two turns, or one turn with early bird.

This move fails if the Pokémon cannot fall asleep due to uproar, insomnia, or vital spirit.  It also fails if the Pokémon is at full health or is already asleep.
rest.flavorText:
The user goes to
sleep for two turns.
It fully restores the
user’s HP and heals
any status problem.

skyAttack.name: skyAttack
skyAttack.effectText:
Inflicts regular damage.  User charges for one turn before attacking.  Critical hit chance is one level higher than normal.  Has a $effectChance% chance to make the target flinch.

This move cannot be selected by sleep talk.
skyAttack.flavorText:
A second-turn attack
move with a high
critical-hit ratio.
It may also make the
target flinch.

splash.name: splash
splash.effectText:
Does nothing.

This move cannot be used while gravity is in effect.
splash.flavorText:
The user just flops
and splashes around
to no effect at all...

struggle.name: struggle
struggle.effectText:
Inflicts typeless regular damage.  User takes 1/4 its max HP in recoil.  Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.

This move is used automatically when a Pokémon cannot use any other move legally, e.g., due to having no PP remaining or being under the effect of both encore and torment at the same time.

This move's recoil is not treated as recoil for the purposes of anything that affects recoil, such as the ability rock head.  It also is not prevented by magic guard.

This move cannot be copied by mimic, mirror move, or sketch, nor selected by assist or metronome, nor forced by encore.
struggle.flavorText:
An attack that is
used in desperation
only if the user has
no PP. It also hurts
the user slightly.

glare.name: glare
glare.flavorText:
The user intimidates
the foe with the
pattern on its belly
to cause paralysis.

mindReader.name: mindReader
mindReader.effectText:
If the user targets the same target again before the end of the next turn, the move it uses is guaranteed to hit.  This move itself also ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.

One-hit KO moves are also guaranteed to hit, as long as the user is equal or higher level than the target.  This effect also allows the user to hit Pokémon that are off the field due to moves such as dig or fly.

If the target uses detect or protect while under the effect of this move, the user is not guaranteed to hit, but has a (100 - accuracy)% chance to break through the protection.

This effect is passed on by baton pass.
mindReader.flavorText:
The user senses the
foe’s movements
with its mind to
ensure its next
attack does not miss.

explosion.name: explosion
explosion.effectText: User faints, even if the attack fails or misses.  Inflicts regular damage.
explosion.flavorText:
The user explodes to
inflict damage on all
Pokémon in battle.
The user faints upon
using this move.

fireBlast.name: fireBlast
fireBlast.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to burn the target.
fireBlast.flavorText:
The foe is attacked
with an intense blast
of all-consuming fire.
It may also leave the
target with a burn.

agility.name: agility
agility.effectText: Raises the user's Speed by two stages.
agility.flavorText:
The user relaxes and
lightens its body to
move faster.
It sharply boosts
the Speed stat.

psywave.name: psywave
psywave.effectText: Inflicts typeless damage between 50% and 150% of the user's level, selected at random in increments of 10%.
psywave.flavorText:
The foe is attacked
with an odd, hot
energy wave.
The attack varies in
intensity.

triAttack.name: triAttack
triAttack.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to burn, freeze, or paralyze the target.  One of these effects is selected at random; they do not each have independent chances to occur.
triAttack.flavorText:
The user strikes with
a simultaneous three-
beam attack. May also
paralyze, burn, or
freeze the target.

lightScreen.name: lightScreen
lightScreen.effectText:
Erects a barrier around the user's side of the field that reduces damage from special attacks by half for five turns.  In double battles, the reduction is 1/3.  Critical hits are not affected by the barrier.

If the user is holding light clay, the barrier lasts for eight turns.

brick break or defog used by an opponent will destroy the barrier.
lightScreen.flavorText:
A wondrous wall of
light is put up to
suppress damage from
special attacks for
five turns.

spore.name: spore
spore.flavorText:
The user scatters
bursts of spores
that induce sleep.

acidArmor.name: acidArmor
acidArmor.effectText: Raises the user's Defense by two stages.
acidArmor.flavorText:
The user alters its
cellular structure to
liquefy itself,
sharply raising its
Defense stat.

thief.name: thief
thief.effectText:
Inflicts regular damage.  If the target is holding an item and the user is not, the user will permanently take the item.  Damage is still inflicted if an item cannot be taken.

Pokémon with sticky hold or multitype are immune to the item theft effect.

The target cannot recover its item with recycle.

This move cannot be selected by assist or metronome.
thief.flavorText:
The user attacks and
steals the foe’s held
item simultaneously.
It can’t steal if the
user holds an item.

tripleKick.name: tripleKick
tripleKick.effectText:
Inflicts regular damage.  Hits three times in the same turn.  The second hit has double power, and the third hit has triple power.  Each hit has a separate accuracy check, and this move stops if a hit misses.

skill link does not apply.
tripleKick.flavorText:
A consecutive three-
kick attack that
becomes more
powerful with each 
successive hit.

flash.name: flash
flash.effectText: Lowers the target's accuracy by one stage.
flash.flavorText:
The user flashes a
light that cuts the
foe’s accuracy.
It can also be used
to illuminate caves.

spite.name: spite
spite.effectText: Lowers the PP of the target's last used move by 4.  If the target hasn't used a move since entering the field, if it tried to use a move this turn and failed, or if its last used move has 0 PP remaining, this move will fail.
spite.flavorText:
The user looses its
grudge on the move
last used by the foe
by cutting 4 PP from
it.

leechLife.name: leechLife
leechLife.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.
leechLife.flavorText:
A blood-draining
attack. The user’s
HP is restored by
half the damage taken
by the target.

bubble.name: bubble
bubble.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to lower the target's Speed by one stage.
bubble.flavorText:
A spray of countless
bubbles is jetted at
the foe.
It may also lower the
target’s Speed stat.

powderSnow.name: powderSnow
powderSnow.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to freeze the target.
powderSnow.flavorText:
The user attacks with
a chilling gust of
powdery snow.
It may also freeze
the target.

bellyDrum.name: bellyDrum
bellyDrum.effectText: User pays half its max HP to raise its Attack to +6 stages.  If the user cannot pay the HP cost, this move will fail.
bellyDrum.flavorText:
The user maximizes
its Attack stat in
exchange for HP
equal to half its max
HP.

crabhammer.name: crabhammer
crabhammer.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  User's critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move.
crabhammer.flavorText:
The foe is hammered
with a large pincer.
This move has a high
critical-hit ratio.

conversion.name: conversion
conversion.effectText: User's type changes to the type of one of its moves, selected at random.  hidden power and weather ball are treated as normal.  Only moves with a different type are eligible, and curse is never eligible.  If the user has no suitable moves, this move will fail.
conversion.flavorText:
The user changes its
type to become the
same type as one of
its moves.

outrage.name: outrage
outrage.effectText:
Inflicts regular damage.  User is forced to attack with this move for 2–3 turns,selected at random.  After the last hit, the user becomes confused.

safeguard does not protect against the confusion from this move.
outrage.flavorText:
The user rampages
and attacks for two
to three turns.
However, it then
becomes confused.

snore.name: snore
snore.effectText: Only usable if the user is sleeping.  Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to make the target flinch.
snore.flavorText:
An attack that can
be used only if the
user is asleep. The
harsh noise may also
make the foe flinch.

sludgeBomb.name: sludgeBomb
sludgeBomb.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to poison the target.
sludgeBomb.flavorText:
The user attacks by
hurling filthy sludge
at the foe.
It may also poison
the target.

poisonGas.name: poisonGas
poisonGas.flavorText:
A cloud of poison gas
is sprayed in the
foe’s face.
It may poison the
target.

furySwipes.name: furySwipes
furySwipes.effectText:
Inflicts regular damage.  Hits 2–5 times in one turn.

Has a 3/8 chance each to hit 2 or 3 times, and a 1/8 chance each to hit 4 or 5 times.  Averages to 3 hits per use.
furySwipes.flavorText:
The foe is raked with
sharp claws or
scythes for two to
five times in quick
succession.

spiderWeb.name: spiderWeb
spiderWeb.effectText:
The target cannot switch out normally.  Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.  This effect ends when the user leaves the field.

The target may still escape by using baton pass, u turn, or a shed shell.

Both the user and the target pass on this effect with baton pass.
spiderWeb.flavorText:
The user ensnares
the foe with a thin,
gooey silk so it can’t
flee from battle.

dizzyPunch.name: dizzyPunch
dizzyPunch.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to confuse the target.
dizzyPunch.flavorText:
The foe is hit with
rhythmically launched
punches that may also
leave it confused.

slash.name: slash
slash.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  User's critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move.
slash.flavorText:
The foe is attacked
with a slash of
claws, etc.
It has a high
critical-hit ratio.

foresight.name: foresight
foresight.effectText: Resets the target's evasion to normal and prevents any further boosting until the target leaves the field.  A ghost under this effect takes normal damage from normal and fighting moves.  This move itself ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.
foresight.flavorText:
Enables the user to
hit a Ghost type with
any type of move. It
also enables the user
to hit an evasive foe.

flail.name: flail
flail.effectText:
Inflicts regular damage.  Power varies inversely with the user's proportional remaining HP.

64 * current HP / max HP | Power
-----------------------: | ----:
 0– 1                    |  200
 2– 5                    |  150
 6–12                    |  100
13–21                    |   80
22–42                    |   40
43–64                    |   20
flail.flavorText:
The user flails about
aimlessly to attack.
It becomes more
powerful the less HP
the user has.

lockOn.name: lockOn
lockOn.effectText:
If the user targets the same target again before the end of the next turn, the move it uses is guaranteed to hit.  This move itself also ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.

One-hit KO moves are also guaranteed to hit, as long as the user is equal or higher level than the target.  This effect also allows the user to hit Pokémon that are off the field due to moves such as dig or fly.

If the target uses detect or protect while under the effect of this move, the user is not guaranteed to hit, but has a (100 - accuracy)% chance to break through the protection.

This effect is passed on by baton pass.
lockOn.flavorText:
The user takes sure
aim at the foe.
It ensures the next
attack does not fail
to hit the target.

icyWind.name: icyWind
icyWind.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to lower the target's Speed by one stage.
icyWind.flavorText:
The user attacks with
a gust of chilled air.
It also lowers the
target’s Speed stat.

protect.name: protect
protect.effectText:
No moves will hit the user for the remainder of this turn.  If the user is last to act this turn, this move will fail.

If the user successfully used detect, endure, protect, quick guard, or wide guard on the last turn, this move has a 50% chance to fail.

lock on, mind reader, and no guard provide a (100 – accuracy)% chance for moves to break through this move.  This does not apply to one-hit KO moves (fissure, guillotine, horn drill, and sheer cold); those are always blocked by this move.

thunder during rain dance and blizzard during hail have a 30% chance to break through this move.

The following effects are not prevented by this move:

* acupressure from an ally
* curse's curse effect
* Delayed damage from doom desire and future sight; however, these moves will be prevented if they are used this turn
* feint, which will also end this move's protection after it hits
* imprison
* perish song
* shadow force
* Moves that merely copy the user, such as transform or psych up

This move cannot be selected by assist or metronome.
protect.flavorText:
It enables the user
to evade all attacks.
Its chance of failing
rises if it is used in
succession.

superFang.name: superFang
superFang.effectText: Inflicts typeless damage equal to half the target's remaining HP.
superFang.flavorText:
The user chomps hard
on the foe with its
sharp front fangs.
It cuts the target’s
HP to half.

zapCannon.name: zapCannon
zapCannon.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to paralyze the target.
zapCannon.flavorText:
The user fires an
electric blast like a
cannon to inflict
damage and cause
paralysis.

cottonSpore.name: cottonSpore
cottonSpore.effectText: Lowers the target's Speed by two stages.
cottonSpore.flavorText:
The user releases
cottonlike spores
that cling to the
foe, sharply reducing
its Speed stat.

sharpen.name: sharpen
sharpen.effectText: Raises the user's Attack by one stage.
sharpen.flavorText:
The user reduces its
polygon count to
make itself more
jagged, raising the
Attack stat.

substitute.name: substitute
substitute.effectText:
Transfers 1/4 the user's max HP into a doll that absorbs damage and causes most negative move effects to fail.  If the user leaves the field, the doll will vanish.  If the user cannot pay the HP cost, this move will fail.

The doll takes damage as normal, using the user's stats and types, and will break when its HP reaches zero.  Self-inflicted damage from confusion or recoil is not absorbed.  Healing effects from opponents ignore the doll and heal the user as normal.  Moves that work based on the user's HP still do so; the doll's HP does not influence any move.

The doll will block major status effects, confusion, and flinching.  The effects of smelling salts and wake up slap do not trigger against a doll, even if the Pokémon behind the doll has the appropriate major status effect.  Multi-turn trapping moves like wrap will hit the doll for their regular damage, but the multi-turn trapping and damage effects will not activate.

Moves blocked or damage absorbed by the doll do not count as hitting the user or inflicting damage for any effects that respond to such, e.g., avalanche, counter, or a rowap berry.  magic coat still works as normal, even against moves the doll would block.  Opposing Pokémon that damage the doll with a leech move like absorb are healed as normal.

It will also block acupressure, block, the curse effect of curse, dream eater, embargo, flatter, gastro acid, grudge, heal block, leech seed, lock on, mean look, mimic, mind reader, nightmare, pain split, psycho shift, spider web, sketch, swagger, switcheroo, trick, worry seed, and yawn.  A Pokémon affected by yawn before summoning the doll will still fall to sleep.

The doll blocks intimidate, but all other abilities act as though the doll did not exist.  If the user has an ability that absorbs moves of a certain type for HP (such as volt absorb absorbing thunder wave), such moves will not be blocked.

life orb and berries that cause confusion still work as normal, but their respective HP loss and confusion are absorbed/blocked by the doll.

The user is still vulnerable to damage inflicted when entering or leaving the field, such as by pursuit or spikes; however, the doll will block the poison effect of toxic spikes.

The doll is passed on by baton pass.  It keeps its existing HP, but uses the replacement Pokémon's stats and types for damage calculation.

All other effects work as normal.
substitute.flavorText:
The user makes a
copy of itself using
some of its HP.
The copy serves as
the user’s decoy.

machPunch.name: machPunch
machPunch.flavorText:
The user throws a
punch at blinding
speed.
It is certain to
strike first.

aeroblast.name: aeroblast
aeroblast.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  User's critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move.
aeroblast.flavorText:
A vortex of air is
shot at the foe to
inflict damage.
It has a high
critical-hit ratio.

sweetKiss.name: sweetKiss
sweetKiss.flavorText:
The user kisses the
foe with a sweet,
angelic cuteness that
causes confusion.

lovelyKiss.name: lovelyKiss
lovelyKiss.flavorText:
With a scary face,
the user forces a
kiss on the foe.
It may make the
target fall asleep.

mudSlap.name: mudSlap
mudSlap.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to lower the target's accuracy by one stage.
mudSlap.flavorText:
The user hurls mud in
the foe’s face to
inflict damage and
lower its accuracy.

transform.name: transform
transform.effectText:
User copies the target's species, weight, type, ability, calculated stats (except HP), and moves.  Copied moves will all have 5 PP remaining.  IVs are copied for the purposes of hidden power, but stats are not recalculated.

choice band, choice scarf, and choice specs stay in effect, and the user must select a new move.

This move cannot be copied by mirror move, nor forced by encore.
transform.flavorText:
The user transforms
into a copy of the
foe right down to
having the same move
set.

destinyBond.name: destinyBond
destinyBond.effectText:
If the user faints before its next move, the Pokémon that fainted it will automatically faint.  End-of-turn damage is ignored.

This move cannot be selected by assist or metronome.
destinyBond.flavorText:
When this move is
used, if the user
faints, the foe that
landed the knockout
hit also faints.

feintAttack.name: feintAttack
feintAttack.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.
feintAttack.flavorText:
The user draws up to
the foe disarmingly,
then throws a sucker
punch.
It hits without fail.

reversal.name: reversal
reversal.effectText:
Inflicts regular damage.  Power varies inversely with the user's proportional remaining HP.

64 * current HP / max HP | Power
-----------------------: | ----:
 0– 1                    |  200
 2– 5                    |  150
 6–12                    |  100
13–21                    |   80
22–42                    |   40
43–64                    |   20
reversal.flavorText:
An all-out attack
that becomes more
powerful the less
HP the user has.

octazooka.name: octazooka
octazooka.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to lower the target's accuracy by one stage.
octazooka.flavorText:
The user attacks by
spraying ink in the
foe’s face or eyes.
It may also lower the
target’s accuracy.

flameWheel.name: flameWheel
flameWheel.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to burn the target.  Frozen Pokémon may use this move, in which case they will thaw.
flameWheel.flavorText:
The user cloaks
itself in fire and
charges at the foe.
It may also leave the
target with a burn.

detect.name: detect
detect.effectText:
No moves will hit the user for the remainder of this turn.  If the user is last to act this turn, this move will fail.

If the user successfully used detect, endure, protect, quick guard, or wide guard on the last turn, this move has a 50% chance to fail.

lock on, mind reader, and no guard provide a (100 – accuracy)% chance for moves to break through this move.  This does not apply to one-hit KO moves (fissure, guillotine, horn drill, and sheer cold); those are always blocked by this move.

thunder during rain dance and blizzard during hail have a 30% chance to break through this move.

The following effects are not prevented by this move:

* acupressure from an ally
* curse's curse effect
* Delayed damage from doom desire and future sight; however, these moves will be prevented if they are used this turn
* feint, which will also end this move's protection after it hits
* imprison
* perish song
* shadow force
* Moves that merely copy the user, such as transform or psych up

This move cannot be selected by assist or metronome.
detect.flavorText:
It enables the user
to evade all attacks.
Its chance of failing
rises if it is used in
succession.

scaryFace.name: scaryFace
scaryFace.effectText: Lowers the target's Speed by two stages.
scaryFace.flavorText:
The user frightens
the foe with a scary
face to sharply
reduce its Speed
stat.

conversion2.name: conversion2
conversion2.effectText: Changes the user's type to a type either resistant or immune to the last damaging move that hit it.  The new type is selected at random and cannot be a type the user already is.  If there is no eligible new type, this move will fail.
conversion2.flavorText:
The user changes its
type to make itself
resistant to the type
of the attack it
last took.

perishSong.name: perishSong
perishSong.effectText:
Every Pokémon is given a counter that starts at 3 and decreases by 1 at the end of every turn, including this one.  When a Pokémon's counter reaches zero, that Pokémon faints.  A Pokémon that leaves the field will lose its counter; its replacement does not inherit the effect, and other Pokémon's counters remain.

This effect is passed on by baton pass.

This move cannot be copied by mirror move.
perishSong.flavorText:
Any Pokémon that
hears this song
faints in three turns
unless it switches
out of battle.

dreamEater.name: dreamEater
dreamEater.effectText: Fails if not used on a sleeping Pokémon.  Inflicts regular damage.  Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.
dreamEater.flavorText:
An attack that works
only on a sleeping
foe. It absorbs half
the damage caused to
heal the user’s HP.

nightmare.name: nightmare
nightmare.effectText: Only works on sleeping Pokémon.  Gives the target a nightmare, damaging it for 1/4 its max HP every turn.  If the target wakes up or leaves the field, this effect ends.
nightmare.flavorText:
A sleeping foe is
shown a nightmare
that inflicts some
damage every turn.

spikes.name: spikes
spikes.effectText:
Scatters spikes around the opposing field, which damage opposing Pokémon that enter the field for 1/8 of their max HP.  Pokémon immune to ground moves are immune to this damage, except during gravity.  Up to three layers of spikes may be laid down, adding 1/16 to the damage done: two layers of spikes damage for 3/16 max HP, and three layers damage for 1/4 max HP.

wonder guard does not block damage from this effect.

rapid spin removes this effect from its user's side of the field.  defog removes this effect from its target's side of the field.
spikes.flavorText:
The user lays a trap
of spikes at the
foe’s feet. The trap
hurts foes that
switch into battle.

boneRush.name: boneRush
boneRush.effectText:
Inflicts regular damage.  Hits 2–5 times in one turn.

Has a 3/8 chance each to hit 2 or 3 times, and a 1/8 chance each to hit 4 or 5 times.  Averages to 3 hits per use.
boneRush.flavorText:
The user strikes at
the foe with a hard
bone two to five
times in a row.

barrage.name: barrage
barrage.effectText:
Inflicts regular damage.  Hits 2–5 times in one turn.

Has a 3/8 chance each to hit 2 or 3 times, and a 1/8 chance each to hit 4 or 5 times.  Averages to 3 hits per use.
barrage.flavorText:
Round objects are
hurled at the foe to
strike two to five
times in a row.

curse.name: curse
curse.effectText:
If the user is a ghost: user pays half its max HP to place a curse on the target, damaging it for 1/4 its max HP every turn.
Otherwise: Lowers the user's Speed by one stage, and raises its Attack and Defense by one stage each.

The curse effect is passed on by baton pass.

This move cannot be copied by mirror move.
curse.flavorText:
A move that works
differently for the
Ghost type than for
all the other types.

rockSlide.name: rockSlide
rockSlide.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to make the target flinch.
rockSlide.flavorText:
Large boulders are
hurled at the foe to
inflict damage.
It may also make the
target flinch.

hyperFang.name: hyperFang
hyperFang.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to make the target flinch.
hyperFang.flavorText:
The user bites hard
on the foe with its
sharp front fangs.
It may also make the
target flinch.

painSplit.name: painSplit
painSplit.effectText:
Changes the user's and target's remaining HP to the average of their current remaining HP.  Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.  This effect does not count as inflicting damage for other moves and effects that respond to damage taken.

This effect fails against a substitute.
painSplit.flavorText:
The user adds its HP to the target’s HP, then equally
shares the combined HP with the target.

gigaDrain.name: gigaDrain
gigaDrain.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.
gigaDrain.flavorText:
A nutrient-draining attack. The user’s HP is restored
by half the damage taken by the target.

endure.name: endure
endure.effectText:
The user's HP cannot be lowered below 1 by any means for the remainder of this turn.

If the user successfully used detect, endure, protect, quick guard, or wide guard on the last turn, this move has a 50% chance to fail.

This move cannot be selected by assist or metronome.
endure.flavorText:
The user endures any attack with at least 1 HP.
Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

sandstorm.name: sandstorm
sandstorm.effectText:
Changes the weather to a sandstorm for five turns.  Pokémon that are not ground, rock, or steel take 1/16 their max HP at the end of every turn.  Every rock Pokémon's original Special Defense is raised by 50% for the duration of this effect.

solar beam's power is halved.

moonlight, morning sun, and synthesis only heal 1/4 the user's max HP.
sandstorm.flavorText:
A five-turn sandstorm is summoned to hurt all
combatants except the Rock, Ground, and
Steel types. It raises the Sp. Def stat of Rock types.

charm.name: charm
charm.effectText: Lowers the target's Attack by two stages.
charm.flavorText:
The user gazes at the target rather charmingly,
making it less wary. This harshly lowers its
Attack stat.

rollout.name: rollout
rollout.effectText:
Inflicts regular damage.  User is forced to use this move for five turns.  Power doubles every time this move is used in succession to a maximum of 16x, and resets to normal after the lock-in ends.  If this move misses or becomes unusable, the lock-in ends.

If the user has used defense curl since entering the field, this move has double power.
rollout.flavorText:
The user continually rolls into the target over five
turns. It becomes more powerful each time it hits.

swagger.name: swagger
swagger.effectText: Raises the target's Attack by two stages, then confuses it.  If the target's Attack cannot be raised by two stages, the confusion is not applied.
swagger.flavorText:
The user enrages and confuses the target. However,
this also sharply raises the target’s Attack stat.

spark.name: spark
spark.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to paralyze the target.
spark.flavorText:
The user throws an electrically charged tackle at the
target. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

healBell.name: healBell
healBell.effectText: Removes major status effects and confusion from every Pokémon in the user's party.
healBell.flavorText:
The user makes a soothing bell chime to heal the
status conditions of all the party Pokémon.

milkDrink.name: milkDrink
milkDrink.effectText: Heals the user for half its max HP.
milkDrink.flavorText:
The user restores its own HP by up to half of its
max HP.

falseSwipe.name: falseSwipe
falseSwipe.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Will not reduce the target's HP below 1.
falseSwipe.flavorText:
A restrained attack that prevents the target from
fainting. The target is left with at least 1 HP.

sleepTalk.name: sleepTalk
sleepTalk.effectText:
Only usable if the user is sleeping.  Randomly selects and uses one of the user's other three moves.  Use of the selected move requires and costs 0 PP.

This move will not select assist, bide, bounce, chatter, copycat, dig, dive, fly, focus punch, me first, metronome, mirror move, shadow force, skull bash, sky attack, sky drop, sleep talk, solar beam, razor wind, or uproar.

If the selected move requires a recharge turn—i.e., one of blast burn, frenzy plant, giga impact, hydro cannon, hyper beam, roar of time, or rock wrecker—and the user is still sleeping next turn, then it's forced to use this move again and pay another PP for the recharge turn.

This move cannot be copied by mirror move, nor selected by assist, metronome, or sleep talk.
sleepTalk.flavorText:
While it is asleep, the user randomly uses one of the
moves it knows.

furyCutter.name: furyCutter
furyCutter.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Power doubles after every time this move is used, whether consecutively or not, maxing out at 16x.  If this move misses or the user leaves the field, power resets.
furyCutter.flavorText:
The target is slashed with scythes or claws. This
attack becomes more powerful if it hits
in succession.

frustration.name: frustration
frustration.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Power increases inversely with happiness, given by `(255 - happiness) * 2 / 5`, to a maximum of 102.  Power bottoms out at 1.
frustration.flavorText:
This full-power attack grows more powerful the
less the user likes its Trainer.

return.name: return
return.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Power increases with happiness, given by `happiness * 2 / 5`, to a maximum of 102.  Power bottoms out at 1.
return.flavorText:
This full-power attack grows more powerful the
more the user likes its Trainer.

attract.name: attract
attract.effectText: Causes the target to fall in love with the user, giving it a 50% chance to do nothing each turn.  If the user and target are the same gender, or either is genderless, this move will fail.  If either Pokémon leaves the field, this effect ends.
attract.flavorText:
If it is the opposite gender of the user, the target
becomes infatuated and less likely to attack.

meanLook.name: meanLook
meanLook.effectText:
The target cannot switch out normally.  Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.  This effect ends when the user leaves the field.

The target may still escape by using baton pass, u turn, or a shed shell.

Both the user and the target pass on this effect with baton pass.
meanLook.flavorText:
The user pins the target with a dark, arresting look.
The target becomes unable to flee.

magnitude.name: magnitude
magnitude.effectText:
Inflicts regular damage.  Power is selected at random between 10 and 150, with an average of 71:

Magnitude | Power | Chance
--------: | ----: | -----:
        4 |    10 |     5%
        5 |    30 |    10%
        6 |    50 |    20%
        7 |    70 |    30%
        8 |    90 |    20%
        9 |   110 |    10%
       10 |   150 |     5%

This move has double power against Pokémon currently underground due to dig.
magnitude.flavorText:
The user attacks everything around it with a
ground-shaking quake. Its power varies.

sacredFire.name: sacredFire
sacredFire.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to burn the target.  Frozen Pokémon may use this move, in which case they will thaw.
sacredFire.flavorText:
The target is razed with a mystical fire of great
intensity. This may also leave the target with a burn.

dynamicPunch.name: dynamicPunch
dynamicPunch.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to confuse the target.
dynamicPunch.flavorText:
The user punches the target with full, concentrated
power. This confuses the target if it hits.

steelWing.name: steelWing
steelWing.effectText: Inflicts regular damage. Has a $effectChance% chance to raise the user's Defense one stage.
steelWing.flavorText:
The target is hit with wings of steel. This may also
raise the user’s Defense stat.

batonPass.name: batonPass
batonPass.effectText:
User switches out, and the trainer selects a replacement Pokémon from the party.  Stat changes, confusion, and persistent move effects are passed along to the replacement Pokémon.

The following move effects are passed:

* aqua ring
* both the user's and target's effect of block, mean look, and spider web
* the curse effect of curse
* embargo
* focus energy or an activated lansat berry
* gastro acid
* ingrain
* being sapped by leech seed
* being targeted by lock on or mind reader
* magnet rise
* perish song's counter
* power trick
* substitute; the doll's HP is unchanged

The replacement Pokémon does not trigger effects that respond to Pokémon switching in.
batonPass.flavorText:
The user switches places with a party Pokémon in
waiting and passes along any stat changes.

vitalThrow.name: vitalThrow
vitalThrow.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.
vitalThrow.flavorText:
The user attacks last. In return, this throw move
never misses.

present.name: present
present.effectText:
Randomly uses one of the following effects.

Effect                                             | Chance
-------------------------------------------------- | -----:
Inflicts regular damage with 40 power  |    40%
Inflicts regular damage with 80 power  |    30%
Inflicts regular damage with 120 power |    10%
Heals the target for 1/4 its max HP    |    20%

On average, this move inflicts regular damage with 52 power and heals the target for 1/20 its max HP.
present.flavorText:
The user attacks by giving the target a gift with a
hidden trap. It restores HP sometimes, however.

ironTail.name: ironTail
ironTail.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to lower the target's Defense by one stage.
ironTail.flavorText:
The target is slammed with a steel-hard tail.
This may also lower the target’s Defense stat.

moonlight.name: moonlight
moonlight.effectText:
Heals the user for half its max HP.

During sunny day, the healing is increased to 2/3 max HP.

During hail, rain dance, or sandstorm, the healing is decreased to 1/4 max HP.
moonlight.flavorText:
The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP
regained varies with the weather.

synthesis.name: synthesis
synthesis.effectText:
Heals the user for half its max HP.

During sunny day, the healing is increased to 2/3 max HP.

During hail, rain dance, or sandstorm, the healing is decreased to 1/4 max HP.
synthesis.flavorText:
The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP
regained varies with the weather.

megahorn.name: megahorn
megahorn.flavorText:
Using its tough and impressive horn, the user rams
into the target with no letup.

twister.name: twister
twister.effectText:
Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to make each target flinch.

If the target is under the effect of bounce, fly, or sky drop, this move will hit with double power.
twister.flavorText:
The user whips up a vicious tornado to tear at the
opposing Pokémon. This may also make them flinch.

rapidSpin.name: rapidSpin
rapidSpin.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Removes leech seed from the user, frees the user from bind, clamp, fire spin, magma storm, sand tomb, whirlpool, and wrap, and clears spikes, stealth rock, and toxic spikes from the user's side of the field.  If this move misses or has no effect, its effect doesn't activate.
rapidSpin.flavorText:
A spin attack that can also eliminate such moves as
Bind, Wrap, Leech Seed, and Spikes.

pursuit.name: pursuit
pursuit.effectText:
Inflicts regular damage.  If the target attempts to switch out this turn before the user acts, this move hits the target before it leaves and has double power.

This effect can still hit a Pokémon that switches out when it has a substitute up or when an ally has used follow me.
pursuit.flavorText:
The power of this attack move is doubled if it’s used
on a target that’s switching out of battle.

sweetScent.name: sweetScent
sweetScent.effectText: Lowers the target's evasion by one stage.
sweetScent.flavorText:
A sweet scent that harshly lowers opposing
Pokémon’s evasiveness.

encore.name: encore
encore.effectText:
The next 4–8 times (selected at random) the target attempts to move, it is forced to repeat its last used move.  If the selected move allows the trainer to select a target, an opponent will be selected at random each turn.  If the target is prevented from using the selected move by some other effect, struggle will be used instead.  This effect ends if the selected move runs out of PP.

If the target hasn't used a move since entering the field, if it tried to use a move this turn and failed, if it does not know the selected move, or if the selected move has 0 PP remaining, this move will fail.  If the target's last used move was encore, mimic, mirror move, sketch, struggle, or transform, this move will fail.
encore.flavorText:
The user compels the target to keep using the move
it encored for three turns.

sunnyDay.name: sunnyDay
sunnyDay.effectText:
Changes the weather to sunshine for five turns, during which fire moves inflict 50% extra damage, and water moves inflict half damage.

If the user is holding heat rock, this effect lasts for eight turns.

Pokémon cannot become frozen.

thunder has 50% accuracy.

solar beam skips its charge turn.

moonlight, morning sun, and synthesis heal 2/3 of the user's max HP.

Pokémon with chlorophyll have doubled original Speed.

Pokémon with forecast become fire.

Pokémon with leaf guard are not affected by major status effects.

Pokémon with flower gift change form; every Pokémon on their side of the field have their original Attack and Special Attack increased by 50%.

Pokémon with dry skin lose 1/8 max HP at the end of each turn.

Pokémon with solar power have their original Special Attack raised by 50% but lose 1/8 their max HP at the end of each turn.
sunnyDay.flavorText:
The user intensifies the sun for five turns, powering
up Fire-type moves. It lowers the power of
Water-type moves.

extremeSpeed.name: extremeSpeed
extremeSpeed.flavorText:
The user charges the target at blinding speed.
This move always goes first.

followMe.name: followMe
followMe.effectText:
Until the end of this turn, any moves that opposing Pokémon target solely at the user's ally will instead target the user.  If both Pokémon on the same side of the field use this move on the same turn, the Pokémon that uses it last will become the target.

This effect takes priority over lightning rod and storm drain.

If the user's ally switches out, opposing Pokémon may still hit it with pursuit.

This move cannot be selected by assist or metronome.
followMe.flavorText:
The user draws attention to itself, making all targets
take aim only at the user.

facade.name: facade
facade.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  If the user is burned, paralyzed, or poisoned, this move has double power.
facade.flavorText:
This attack move doubles its power if the user is
poisoned, burned, or paralyzed.

crunch.name: crunch
crunch.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to lower the target's Defense by one stage.
crunch.flavorText:
The user crunches up the target with sharp fangs.
This may also lower the target’s Defense stat.

crossChop.name: crossChop
crossChop.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  User's critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move.
crossChop.flavorText:
The user delivers a double chop with its forearms
crossed. Critical hits land more easily.

focusPunch.name: focusPunch
focusPunch.effectText:
Inflicts regular damage.  If the user takes damage this turn before hitting, this move will fail.

This move cannot be copied by mirror move, nor selected by assist, metronome, or sleep talk.
focusPunch.flavorText:
The user focuses its mind before launching a punch.
This move fails if the user is hit before it is used.

dragonBreath.name: dragonBreath
dragonBreath.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to paralyze the target.
dragonBreath.flavorText:
The user exhales a mighty gust that inflicts damage.
This may also leave the target with paralysis.

rockSmash.name: rockSmash
rockSmash.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to lower the target's Defense by one stage.
rockSmash.flavorText:
