The user attacks with a punch. This may also lower
the target’s Defense stat.

metalClaw.name: metalClaw
metalClaw.effectText: Inflicts regular damage. Has a $effectChance% chance to raise the user's Attack one stage.
metalClaw.flavorText:
The target is raked with steel claws. This may also
raise the user’s Attack stat.

psychUp.name: psychUp
psychUp.effectText:
Discards the user's stat changes and copies the target's.

This move cannot be copied by mirror move.
psychUp.flavorText:
The user hypnotizes itself into copying any stat
change made by the target.

uproar.name: uproar
uproar.effectText:
Inflicts regular damage.  User is forced to use this move for 2–5 turns, selected at random.  All Pokémon on the field wake up, and none can fall to sleep until the lock-in ends.

Pokémon cannot use rest during this effect.

This move cannot be selected by sleep talk.
uproar.flavorText:
The user attacks in an uproar for three turns.
During that time, no Pokémon can fall asleep.

whirlpool.name: whirlpool
whirlpool.effectText:
Inflicts regular damage.  For the next 2–5 turns, the target cannot leave the field and is damaged for 1/16 its max HP at the end of each turn.  The user continues to use other moves during this time.  If the user leaves the field, this effect ends.

Has a 3/8 chance each to hit 2 or 3 times, and a 1/8 chance each to hit 4 or 5 times.  Averages to 3 hits per use.

If the target is in the first turn of dive, this move will hit with double power.
whirlpool.flavorText:
The user traps the target in a violent swirling
whirlpool for four to five turns.

shadowBall.name: shadowBall
shadowBall.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by one stage.
shadowBall.flavorText:
The user hurls a shadowy blob at the target.
This may also lower the target’s Sp. Def stat.

stockpile.name: stockpile
stockpile.effectText:
Raises the user's Defense and Special Defense by one stage each.  Stores energy for use with spit up and swallow.  Up to three levels of energy can be stored, and all are lost if the user leaves the field.  Energy is still stored even if the stat boosts cannot be applied.

If the user uses baton pass, the stat boosts are passed as normal, but the stored energy is not.
stockpile.flavorText:
The user charges up power and raises both its
Defense and Sp. Def stats. The move can be used
three times.

smellingSalts.name: smellingSalts
smellingSalts.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  If the target is paralyzed, this move has double power, and the target is cured of its paralysis.
smellingSalts.flavorText:
This attack’s power is doubled when used on a
target with paralysis. This also cures the target’s
paralysis, however.

skillSwap.name: skillSwap
skillSwap.effectText:
User and target switch abilities.  Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.

If either Pokémon has multitype or wonder guard, this move will fail.
skillSwap.flavorText:
The user employs its psychic power to exchange
Abilities with the target.

ingrain.name: ingrain
ingrain.effectText:
Prevents the user from switching out.  User regains 1/16 of its max HP at the end of every turn.  If the user was immune to ground attacks, it will now take normal damage from them.

roar and whirlwind will not affect the user.  The user cannot use magnet rise.

The user may still use u turn to leave the field.

This effect can be passed with baton pass.
ingrain.flavorText:
The user lays roots that restore its HP on every turn.
Because it’s rooted, it can’t switch out.

safeguard.name: safeguard
safeguard.effectText:
Protects Pokémon on the user's side of the field from major status effects and confusion for five turns.  Does not cancel existing ailments.  This effect remains even if the user leaves the field.

If yawn is used while this move is in effect, it will immediately fail.

defog used by an opponent will end this effect.

This effect does not prevent the confusion caused by outrage, petal dance, or thrash.
safeguard.flavorText:
The user creates a protective field that prevents
status conditions for five turns.

rolePlay.name: rolePlay
rolePlay.effectText:
User's ability is replaced with the target's until the user leaves the field.  Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.

If the target has flower gift, forecast, illusion, imposter, multitype, stance change, trace, wonder guard, or zen mode, this move will fail.

This move cannot be copied by mirror move.
rolePlay.flavorText:
The user mimics the target completely, copying the
target’s natural Ability.

mirrorCoat.name: mirrorCoat
mirrorCoat.effectText:
Targets the last opposing Pokémon to hit the user with a special move this turn.  Inflicts twice the damage that move did to the user.  If there is no eligible target, this move will fail.  Type immunity applies, but other type effects are ignored.

This move cannot be copied by mirror move, nor selected by assist or metronome.
mirrorCoat.flavorText:
A retaliation move that counters any special attack,
inflicting double the damage taken.

morningSun.name: morningSun
morningSun.effectText:
Heals the user for half its max HP.

During sunny day, the healing is increased to 2/3 max HP.

During hail, rain dance, or sandstorm, the healing is decreased to 1/4 max HP.
morningSun.flavorText:
The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP
regained varies with the weather.

flatter.name: flatter
flatter.effectText: Raises the target's Special Attack by one stage, then confuses it.
flatter.flavorText:
Flattery is used to confuse the target. However,
this also raises the target’s Sp. Atk stat.

secretPower.name: secretPower
secretPower.effectText:
Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to inflict an effect chosen according to the terrain.

Terrain        | Effect
-------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------
Building       | Paralyzes target
Cave           | Makes target flinch
Deep water     | Lowers target's Attack by one stage
Desert         | Lowers target's accuracy by one stage
Grass          | Puts target to sleep
Mountain       | Makes target flinch
Road           | Lowers target's accuracy by one stage
Shallow water  | Lowers target's Attack by one stage
Snow           | Freezes target
Tall grass     | Puts target to sleep

In Pokémon Battle Revolution:

Terrain        | Effect
-------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------
Courtyard      | Paralyzes target
Crystal        | Makes target flinch
Gateway        | Lowers target's Attack by one stage
Magma          | Makes target flinch
Main Street    | Paralyzes target
Neon           | Paralyzes target
Stargazer      | Makes target flinch
Sunny Park     | Puts target to sleep
Sunset         | Lowers target's accuracy by one stage
Waterfall      | Puts target to sleep
secretPower.flavorText:
The additional effects of this attack depend upon
where it was used.

beatUp.name: beatUp
beatUp.effectText:
Inflicts typeless regular damage.  Every Pokémon in the user's party, excepting those that have fainted or have a major status effect, attacks the target.  Calculated stats are ignored; the base stats for the target and assorted attackers are used instead.  The random factor in the damage formula is not used.  dark Pokémon still get STAB.

This effect breaks through wonder guard.
beatUp.flavorText:
The user gets all party Pokémon to attack the target.
The more party Pokémon, the greater the number
of attacks.

futureSight.name: futureSight
futureSight.effectText:
Inflicts typeless regular damage at the end of the third turn, starting with this one.  This move cannot score a critical hit.  If the target switches out, its replacement will be hit instead.  Damage is calculated at the time this move is used; stat changes and switching out during the delay won't change the damage inflicted.  No move with this effect can be used against the same target again until after the end of the third turn.

This effect breaks through wonder guard.

If the target is protected by protect or detect on the turn this move is used, this move will fail.  However, the damage on the third turn will break through protection.

The damage is applied at the end of the turn, so it ignores endure and focus sash.

This move cannot be copied by mirror move.
futureSight.flavorText:
Two turns after this move is used, a hunk of psychic
energy attacks the target.

superpower.name: superpower
superpower.effectText: Inflicts regular damage, then lowers the user's Attack and Defense by one stage each.
superpower.flavorText:
The user attacks the target with great power.
However, this also lowers the user’s Attack and
Defense stats.

naturePower.name: naturePower
naturePower.effectText:
Uses another move chosen according to the terrain.

Terrain                   | Selected move
------------------------- | ------------------
Building                  | tri attack
Cave                      | rock slide
Deep water                | hydro pump
Desert                    | earthquake
Grass                     | seed bomb
Mountain                  | rock slide
Road                      | earthquake
Shallow water             | hydro pump
Snow                      | blizzard
Tall grass                | seed bomb
electric terrain | thunderbolt
grassy terrain   | energy ball
misty terrain    | moonblast

In Pokémon Battle Revolution:

Terrain        | Selected move
-------------- | ------------------
Courtyard      | tri attack
Crystal        | rock slide
Gateway        | hydro pump
Magma          | rock slide
Main Street    | tri attack
Neon           | tri attack
Stargazer      | rock slide
Sunny Park     | seed bomb
Sunset         | earthquake
Waterfall      | seed bomb

This move cannot be copied by mirror move.
naturePower.flavorText:
This attack makes use of nature’s power. Its
effects vary depending on the user’s environment.

camouflage.name: camouflage
camouflage.effectText:
User's type changes according to the terrain.

Terrain        | New type
-------------- | --------------
Building       | normal
Cave           | rock
Desert         | ground
Grass          | grass
Mountain       | rock
Ocean          | water
Pond           | water
Road           | ground
Snow           | ice
Tall grass     | grass

In Pokémon Battle Revolution:

Terrain        | New type
-------------- | --------------
Courtyard      | normal
Crystal        | rock
Gateway        | water
Magma          | rock
Main Street    | normal
Neon           | normal
Stargazer      | rock
Sunny Park     | grass
Sunset         | ground
Waterfall      | grass
camouflage.flavorText:
The user’s type is changed depending on its
environment, such as at water’s edge, in grass, or in
a cave.

spitUp.name: spitUp
spitUp.effectText:
Inflicts regular damage.  Power is equal to 100 times the amount of energy stored by stockpile.  Ignores the random factor in the damage formula.  Stored energy is consumed, and the user's Defense and Special Defense are reset to what they would be if stockpile had not been used.  If the user has no energy stored, this move will fail.

This move cannot be copied by mirror move.
spitUp.flavorText:
The power stored using the move Stockpile is
released at once in an attack. The more power
is stored, the greater the move’s power.

hiddenPower.name: hiddenPower
hiddenPower.effectText:
Inflicts regular damage.  Power and type are determined by the user's IVs.

Power is given by `x * 40 / 63 + 30`.  `x` is obtained by arranging bit 1 from the IV for each of Special Defense, Special Attack, Speed, Defense, Attack, and HP in that order.  (Bit 1 is 1 if the IV is of the form `4n + 2` or `4n + 3`.  `x` is then 64 * Special Defense IV bit 1, plus 32 * Special Attack IV bit 1, etc.)

Power is always between 30 and 70, inclusive.  Average power is 49.5.

Type is given by `y * 15 / 63`, where `y` is similar to `x` above, except constructed from bit 0.  (Bit 0 is 1 if the IV is odd.)  The result is looked up in the following table.

Value | Type
----: | --------
    0 | fighting
    1 | flying
    2 | poison
    3 | ground
    4 | rock
    5 | bug
    6 | ghost
    7 | steel
    8 | fire
    9 | water
   10 | grass
   11 | electric
   12 | psychic
   13 | ice
   14 | dragon
   15 | dark

This move thus cannot be normal.  Most other types have an equal 1/16 chance to be selected, given random IVs.  However, due to the flooring used here, bug, fighting, and grass appear 5/64 of the time, and dark only 1/64 of the time.
hiddenPower.flavorText:
A unique attack that varies in type depending on the
Pokémon using it.

helpingHand.name: helpingHand
helpingHand.effectText:
Boosts the power of the target's moves by 50% until the end of this turn.

This move cannot be copied by mirror move, nor selected by assist or metronome.
helpingHand.flavorText:
The user assists an ally by boosting the power of
that ally’s attack.

snatch.name: snatch
snatch.effectText:
The next time a Pokémon uses a beneficial move on itself or itself and its ally this turn, the user of this move will steal the move and use it itself.  Moves which may be stolen by this move are identified by the "snatchable" flag.

If two Pokémon use this move on the same turn, the faster Pokémon will steal the first beneficial move, and the slower Pokémon will then steal it again—thus, only the slowest Pokémon using this move ultimately gains a stolen move's effect.

If the user steals psych up, it will target the Pokémon that used psych up.  If the user was the original target of psych up, and the Pokémon that originally used it's affected by pressure, it will only lose 1 PP.

This move cannot be copied by mirror move, nor selected by assist or metronome.
snatch.flavorText:
The user steals the effects of any attempts to use a
healing or stat-changing move.

memento.name: memento
memento.effectText: Lowers the target's Attack and Special Attack by two stages.  User faints.
memento.flavorText:
The user faints when using this move. In return, this
harshly lowers the target’s Attack and Sp. Atk stats.

torment.name: torment
torment.effectText:
Prevents the target from attempting to use the same move twice in a row.  When the target leaves the field, this effect ends.

If the target is forced to attempt a repeated move due to choice band, choice scarf, choice specs, disable, encore, taunt, only having PP remaining for one move, or any other effect, the target will use struggle instead.  The target is then free to use the forced move next turn, as it didn't use that move this turn.
torment.flavorText:
The user torments and enrages the target, making it
incapable of using the same move twice in a row.

tickle.name: tickle
tickle.effectText: Lowers the target's Attack and Defense by one stage.
tickle.flavorText:
The user tickles the target into laughing, reducing its
Attack and Defense stats.

slackOff.name: slackOff
slackOff.effectText: Heals the user for half its max HP.
slackOff.flavorText:
The user slacks off, restoring its own HP by up to
half of its max HP.

eruption.name: eruption
eruption.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Power increases with the user's remaining HP and is given by `150 * HP / max HP`, to a maximum of 150 when the user has full HP.
eruption.flavorText:
The user attacks opposing Pokémon with explosive
fury. The lower the user’s HP, the lower the
move’s power.

dive.name: dive
dive.effectText:
Inflicts regular damage.  User dives underwater for one turn, becoming immune to attack, and hits on the second turn.

During the immune turn, surf, and whirlpool still hit the user normally, and their power is doubled if appropriate.

The user may be hit during its immune turn if under the effect of lock on, mind reader, or no guard.

This move cannot be selected by sleep talk.
dive.flavorText:
Diving on the first turn, the user floats up and
attacks on the next turn.

ancientPower.name: ancientPower
ancientPower.effectText: Inflicts regular damage. Has a $effectChance% chance to raise all of the user's stats one stage.
ancientPower.flavorText:
The user attacks with a prehistoric power.
This may also raise all the user’s stats at once.

silverWind.name: silverWind
silverWind.effectText: Inflicts regular damage. Has a $effectChance% chance to raise all of the user's stats one stage.
silverWind.flavorText:
The target is attacked with powdery scales blown
by the wind. This may also raise all the user’s stats.

rainDance.name: rainDance
rainDance.effectText:
Changes the weather to rain for five turns, during which water moves inflict 50% extra damage, and fire moves inflict half damage.

If the user is holding damp rock, this effect lasts for eight turns.

thunder has 100% accuracy.  If the target has used detect or protect, thunder has a (100 - accuracy)% chance to break through the protection.

solar beam has half power.

moonlight, morning sun, and synthesis heal only 1/4 of the user's max HP.

Pokémon with swift swim have doubled original Speed.

Pokémon with forecast become water.

Pokémon with dry skin heal 1/8 max HP, Pokémon with hydration are cured of major status effects, and Pokémon with rain dish heal 1/16 max HP at the end of each turn.
rainDance.flavorText:
The user summons a heavy rain that falls for five
turns, powering up Water-type moves. It lowers
the power of Fire-type moves.

mistBall.name: mistBall
mistBall.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to lower the target's Special Attack by one stage.
mistBall.flavorText:
A mist-like flurry of down envelops and damages the
target. This may also lower the target’s Sp. Atk stat.

taunt.name: taunt
taunt.effectText:
Target is forced to only use damaging moves for the next 3–5 turns, selected at random.  Moves that select other moves not known in advance do not count as damaging.

assist, copycat, me first, metronome, mirror move, and sleep talk do not directly inflict damage and thus may not be used.

bide, counter, endeavor, metal burst, and mirror coat are allowed.
taunt.flavorText:
The target is taunted into a rage that allows it to use
only attack moves for three turns.

charge.name: charge
charge.effectText: Raises the user's Special Defense by one stage.  If the user uses an electric move next turn, its power will be doubled.
charge.flavorText:
The user boosts the power of the Electric move it
uses on the next turn. This also raises the user’s
Sp. Def stat.

tailGlow.name: tailGlow
tailGlow.effectText: Raises the user's Special Attack by three stages.
tailGlow.flavorText:
The user stares at flashing lights to focus its mind,
drastically raising its Sp. Atk stat.

grassWhistle.name: grassWhistle
grassWhistle.flavorText:
The user plays a pleasant melody that lulls the
target into a deep sleep.

blazeKick.name: blazeKick
blazeKick.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  User's critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move. Has a $effectChance% chance to burn the target.
blazeKick.flavorText:
The user launches a kick that lands a critical hit
more easily. This may also leave the target with
a burn.

imprison.name: imprison
imprison.effectText: Prevents any Pokémon on the opposing side of the field from using any move the user knows until the user leaves the field.  This effect is live; if the user obtains new moves while on the field, these moves become restricted.  If no opposing Pokémon knows any of the user's moves when this move is used, this move will fail.
imprison.flavorText:
If opposing Pokémon know any move also known by
the user, they are prevented from using it.

shadowPunch.name: shadowPunch
shadowPunch.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.
shadowPunch.flavorText:
The user throws a punch from the shadows. This
attack never misses.

hyperVoice.name: hyperVoice
hyperVoice.flavorText:
The user lets loose a horribly echoing shout with
the power to inflict damage.

mudSport.name: mudSport
mudSport.effectText: electric moves inflict half damage, regardless of target.  If the user leaves the field, this effect ends.
mudSport.flavorText:
The user kicks up mud on the battlefield. This
weakens Electric-type moves for five turns.

crushClaw.name: crushClaw
crushClaw.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to lower the target's Defense by one stage.
crushClaw.flavorText:
The user slashes the target with hard and sharp
claws. This may also lower the target’s Defense stat.

magicCoat.name: magicCoat
magicCoat.effectText:
The first non-damaging move targeting the user this turn that inflicts major status effects, stat changes, or trapping effects will be reflected at its user.

defog, memento, and teeter dance are not reflected.

attract, flatter, gastro acid, leech seed, swagger, worry seed, and yawn are reflected.

This move cannot be copied by mirror move.
magicCoat.flavorText:
A barrier reflects back to the target moves like
Leech Seed and moves that damage status.

fakeOut.name: fakeOut
fakeOut.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Causes the target to flinch.  Can only be used on the user's first turn after entering the field.
fakeOut.flavorText:
This attack hits first and makes the target flinch.
It only works the first turn the user is in battle.

lusterPurge.name: lusterPurge
lusterPurge.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by one stage.
lusterPurge.flavorText:
The user lets loose a damaging burst of light. This
may also lower the target’s Sp. Def stat.

knockOff.name: knockOff
knockOff.effectText:
Inflicts regular damage.  Target loses its held item.

Neither the user nor the target can recover its item with recycle.

If the target has multitype or sticky hold, it will take damage but not lose its item.
knockOff.flavorText:
The user slaps down the target’s held item, and that
item can’t be used in that battle. The move does
more damage if the target has a held item.

waterSpout.name: waterSpout
waterSpout.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Power increases with the user's remaining HP and is given by `150 * HP / max HP`, to a maximum of 150 when the user has full HP.
waterSpout.flavorText:
The user spouts water to damage opposing
Pokémon. The lower the user’s HP, the lower the
move’s power.

grudge.name: grudge
grudge.effectText: If the user faints before it next acts, the move that fainted it will have its PP dropped to 0.  End-of-turn damage does not trigger this effect.
grudge.flavorText:
If the user faints, the user’s grudge fully depletes
the PP of the opponent’s move that knocked it out.

blastBurn.name: blastBurn
blastBurn.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  User loses its next turn to "recharge", and cannot attack or switch out during that turn.
blastBurn.flavorText:
The target is razed by a fiery explosion. The user
can’t move on the next turn.

assist.name: assist
assist.effectText:
Uses a move from another Pokémon in the user's party, both selected at random.  Moves from fainted Pokémon can be used.  If there are no eligible Pokémon or moves, this move will fail.

This move will not select assist, chatter, circle throw, copycat, counter, covet, destiny bond, detect, dig, dive, dragon tail, endure, feint, fly focus punch, follow me, helping hand, me first, metronome, mimic, mirror coat, mirror move, phantom force protect, quick guard, roar shadow force, sketch, sleep talk, snatch, struggle, switcheroo, thief, trick, whirlwind, or wide guard.

This move cannot be copied by mirror move, nor selected by metronome or sleep talk.
assist.flavorText:
The user hurriedly and randomly uses a move among
those known by ally Pokémon.

swallow.name: swallow
swallow.effectText: Heals the user depending on the amount of energy stored by stockpile: 1/4 its max HP after one use, 1/2 its max HP after two uses, or fully after three uses.  Stored energy is consumed, and the user's Defense and Special Defense are reset to what they would be if stockpile had not been used.  If the user has no energy stored, this move will fail.
swallow.flavorText:
The power stored using the move Stockpile is
absorbed by the user to heal its HP. Storing more
power heals more HP.

odorSleuth.name: odorSleuth
odorSleuth.effectText: Resets the target's evasion to normal and prevents any further boosting until the target leaves the field.  A ghost under this effect takes normal damage from normal and fighting moves.  This move itself ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.
odorSleuth.flavorText:
Enables a Ghost-type target to be hit by Normal-
and Fighting-type attacks. This also enables an
evasive target to be hit.

bulletSeed.name: bulletSeed
bulletSeed.effectText:
Inflicts regular damage.  Hits 2–5 times in one turn.

Has a 3/8 chance each to hit 2 or 3 times, and a 1/8 chance each to hit 4 or 5 times.  Averages to 3 hits per use.
bulletSeed.flavorText:
The user forcefully shoots seeds at the target two
to five times in a row.

armThrust.name: armThrust
armThrust.effectText:
Inflicts regular damage.  Hits 2–5 times in one turn.

Has a 3/8 chance each to hit 2 or 3 times, and a 1/8 chance each to hit 4 or 5 times.  Averages to 3 hits per use.
armThrust.flavorText:
The user lets loose a flurry of open-palmed arm
thrusts that hit two to five times in a row.

heatWave.name: heatWave
heatWave.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to burn the target.
heatWave.flavorText:
The user attacks by exhaling hot breath on the
opposing Pokémon. This may also leave those
Pokémon with a burn.

teeterDance.name: teeterDance
teeterDance.flavorText:
The user performs a wobbly dance that confuses
the Pokémon around it.

recycle.name: recycle
recycle.effectText:
User recovers the last item consumed by the user or a Pokémon in its position on the field.  The item must be used again before it can be recovered by this move again.  If the user is holding an item, this move fails.

Items taken or given away by covet, knock off, switcheroo, thief, or trick may not be recovered.
recycle.flavorText:
The user recycles a held item that has been used in
battle so it can be used again.

weatherBall.name: weatherBall
weatherBall.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  If a weather move is active, this move has double power, and its type becomes the type of the weather move.  shadow sky is typeless for the purposes of this move.
weatherBall.flavorText:
This attack move varies in power and type
depending on the weather.

cosmicPower.name: cosmicPower
cosmicPower.effectText: Raises the user's Defense and Special Defense by one stage.
cosmicPower.flavorText:
The user absorbs a mystical power from space to
raise its Defense and Sp. Def stats.

willOWisp.name: willOWisp
willOWisp.flavorText:
The user shoots a sinister, bluish-white flame at the
target to inflict a burn.

refresh.name: refresh
refresh.effectText: Removes a burn, paralysis, or poison from the user.
refresh.flavorText:
The user rests to cure itself of poisoning, a burn,
or paralysis.

trick.name: trick
trick.effectText:
User and target permanently swap held items.  Works even if one of the Pokémon isn't holding anything.  If either Pokémon is holding mail, this move will fail.

If either Pokémon has multitype or sticky hold, this move will fail.

If this move results in a Pokémon obtaining choice band, choice scarf, or choice specs, and that Pokémon was the latter of the pair to move this turn, then the move it used this turn becomes its chosen forced move.  This applies even if both Pokémon had a choice item before this move was used.  If the first of the two Pokémon gains a choice item, it may select whatever choice move it wishes next turn.

Neither the user nor the target can recover its item with recycle.

This move cannot be selected by assist or metronome.
trick.flavorText:
The user catches the target off guard and swaps its
held item with its own.

yawn.name: yawn
yawn.effectText:
Puts the target to sleep at the end of the next turn.  Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.  If the target leaves the field, this effect is canceled.  If the target has a status effect when this move is used, this move will fail.

If the target is protected by safeguard when this move is used, this move will fail.

insomnia and vital spirit prevent the sleep if the target has either at the end of the next turn, but will not cause this move to fail on use.
yawn.flavorText:
The user lets loose a huge yawn that lulls the target
into falling asleep on the next turn.

sheerCold.name: sheerCold
sheerCold.effectText:
Inflicts damage equal to the target's max HP.  Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.  This move's accuracy is 30% plus 1% for each level the user is higher than the target.  If the user is a lower level than the target, this move will fail.

Because this move inflicts a specific and finite amount of damage, endure still prevents the target from fainting.

The effects of lock on, mind reader, and no guard still apply, as long as the user is equal or higher level than the target.  However, they will not give this move a chance to break through detect or protect.
sheerCold.flavorText:
The target faints instantly. It’s less likely to hit the
target if it’s used by Pokémon other than Ice types.

hammerArm.name: hammerArm
hammerArm.effectText: Inflicts regular damage, then lowers the user's Speed by one stage.
hammerArm.flavorText:
The user swings and hits with its strong, heavy fist.
It lowers the user’s Speed, however.

fakeTears.name: fakeTears
fakeTears.effectText: Lowers the target's Special Defense by two stages.
fakeTears.flavorText:
The user feigns crying to fluster the target, harshly
lowering its Sp. Def stat.

endeavor.name: endeavor
endeavor.effectText: Inflicts exactly enough damage to lower the target's HP to equal the user's.  If the target's HP is not higher than the user's, this move has no effect.  Type immunity applies, but other type effects are ignored.  This effect counts as damage for moves that respond to damage.
endeavor.flavorText:
This attack move cuts down the target’s HP to equal
the user’s HP.

skyUppercut.name: skyUppercut
skyUppercut.effectText:
Inflicts regular damage.

This move can hit Pokémon under the effect of bounce, fly, or sky drop.
skyUppercut.flavorText:
The user attacks the target with an uppercut thrown
skyward with force.

covet.name: covet
covet.effectText:
Inflicts regular damage.  If the target is holding an item and the user is not, the user will permanently take the item.  Damage is still inflicted if an item cannot be taken.

Pokémon with sticky hold or multitype are immune to the item theft effect.

The target cannot recover its item with recycle.

This move cannot be selected by assist or metronome.
covet.flavorText:
The user endearingly approaches the target, then
steals the target’s held item.

metalSound.name: metalSound
metalSound.effectText: Lowers the target's Special Defense by two stages.
metalSound.flavorText:
A horrible sound like scraping metal harshly lowers
the target’s Sp. Def stat.

pluck.name: pluck
pluck.effectText:
Inflicts regular damage.  If the target is holding a berry, this move has double power, and the user takes the berry and uses it immediately.

If the target is holding a jaboca berry or rowap berry, the berry is still removed, but has no effect.

If this move is super effective and the target is holding a berry that can reduce this move's damage, it will do so, and will not be stolen.
pluck.flavorText:
The user pecks the target. If the target is holding a
Berry, the user eats it and gains its effect.

revenge.name: revenge
revenge.effectText:
Inflicts regular damage.  If the target damaged the user this turn and was the last to do so, this move has double power.

pain split does not count as damaging the user.
revenge.flavorText:
This attack move’s power is doubled if the user has
been hurt by the opponent in the same turn.

featherDance.name: featherDance
featherDance.effectText: Lowers the target's Attack by two stages.
featherDance.flavorText:
The user covers the target’s body with a mass of
down that harshly lowers its Attack stat.

embargo.name: embargo
embargo.effectText:
Target cannot use its held item for five turns.  If the target leaves the field, this effect ends.

If a Pokémon under this effect uses bug bite or pluck on a Pokémon holding a berry, the berry is destroyed but not used.  If a Pokémon under this effect uses fling, it will fail.

This effect is passed by baton pass.
embargo.flavorText:
This move prevents the target from using its held
item for five turns. Its Trainer is also prevented from
using items on it.

lastResort.name: lastResort
lastResort.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  This move can only be used if each of the user's other moves has been used at least once since the user entered the field.  If this is the user's only move, this move will fail.
lastResort.flavorText:
This move can be used only after the user has used
all the other moves it knows in the battle.

calmMind.name: calmMind
calmMind.effectText: Raises the user's Special Attack and Special Defense by one stage each.
calmMind.flavorText:
The user quietly focuses its mind and calms its
spirit to raise its Sp. Atk and Sp. Def stats.

roost.name: roost
roost.effectText: Heals the user for half its max HP.  If the user is flying, its flying type is ignored until the end of this turn.
roost.flavorText:
The user lands and rests its body. It restores the
user’s HP by up to half of its max HP.

block.name: block
block.effectText:
The target cannot switch out normally.  Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.  This effect ends when the user leaves the field.

The target may still escape by using baton pass, u turn, or a shed shell.

Both the user and the target pass on this effect with baton pass.
block.flavorText:
The user blocks the target’s way with arms spread
wide to prevent escape.

overheat.name: overheat
overheat.effectText: Inflicts regular damage, then lowers the user's Special Attack by two stages.
overheat.flavorText:
The user attacks the target at full power. The
attack’s recoil harshly lowers the user’s Sp. Atk stat.

flareBlitz.name: flareBlitz
flareBlitz.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  User takes 1/3 the damage it inflicts in recoil.  Has a $effectChance% chance to burn the target.  Frozen Pokémon may use this move, in which case they will thaw.
flareBlitz.flavorText:
The user cloaks itself in fire and charges the target.
This also damages the user quite a lot. This attack
may leave the target with a burn.

doomDesire.name: doomDesire
doomDesire.effectText:
Inflicts typeless regular damage at the end of the third turn, starting with this one.  This move cannot score a critical hit.  If the target switches out, its replacement will be hit instead.  Damage is calculated at the time this move is used; stat changes and switching out during the delay won't change the damage inflicted.  No move with this effect can be used against the same target again until after the end of the third turn.

This effect breaks through wonder guard.

If the target is protected by protect or detect on the turn this move is used, this move will fail.  However, the damage on the third turn will break through protection.

The damage is applied at the end of the turn, so it ignores endure and focus sash.

This move cannot be copied by mirror move.
doomDesire.flavorText:
Two turns after this move is used, a concentrated
bundle of light blasts the target.

signalBeam.name: signalBeam
signalBeam.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to confuse the target.
signalBeam.flavorText:
The user attacks with a sinister beam of light.
This may also confuse the target.

brine.name: brine
brine.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  If the target has less than half its max HP remaining, this move has double power.
brine.flavorText:
If the target’s HP is half or less, this attack will hit
with double the power.

gyroBall.name: gyroBall
gyroBall.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Power increases with the target's current Speed compared to the user, given by `1 + 25 * target Speed / user Speed`, capped at 150.
gyroBall.flavorText:
The user tackles the target with a high-speed spin.
The slower the user compared to the target, the
greater the move’s power.

gastroAcid.name: gastroAcid
gastroAcid.effectText:
The target's ability is disabled as long as it remains on the field.

This effect is passed on by baton pass.
gastroAcid.flavorText:
The user hurls up its stomach acids on the target.
The fluid eliminates the effect of the target’s Ability.

wish.name: wish
wish.effectText: At the end of the next turn, user will be healed for half its max HP.  If the user is switched out, its replacement will be healed instead for half of the user's max HP.  If the user faints or is forcefully switched by roar or whirlwind, this effect will not activate.
wish.flavorText:
One turn after this move is used, the user’s or its
replacement’s HP is restored by half the user’s
max HP.

naturalGift.name: naturalGift
naturalGift.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Power and type are determined by the user's held berry.  The berry is consumed.  If the user is not holding a berry, this move will fail.
naturalGift.flavorText:
The user draws power to attack by using its held
Berry. The Berry determines the move’s type
and power.

psychoBoost.name: psychoBoost
psychoBoost.effectText: Inflicts regular damage, then lowers the user's Special Attack by two stages.
psychoBoost.flavorText:
The user attacks the target at full power. The
attack’s recoil harshly lowers the user’s
Sp. Atk stat.

voltTackle.name: voltTackle
voltTackle.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  User takes 1/3 the damage it inflicts in recoil.  Has a $effectChance% chance to paralyze the target.
voltTackle.flavorText:
The user electrifies itself and charges the target.
This also damages the user quite a lot. This attack
may leave the target with paralysis.

psychoShift.name: psychoShift
psychoShift.effectText: If the user has a major status effect and the target does not, the user's status is transferred to the target.
psychoShift.flavorText:
Using its psychic power of suggestion, the user
transfers its status conditions to the target.

poisonJab.name: poisonJab
poisonJab.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to poison the target.
poisonJab.flavorText:
The target is stabbed with a tentacle or arm steeped
in poison. This may also poison the target.

astonish.name: astonish
astonish.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to make the target flinch.
astonish.flavorText:
The user attacks the target while shouting in a
startling fashion. This may also make the
target flinch.

hydroCannon.name: hydroCannon
hydroCannon.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  User loses its next turn to "recharge", and cannot attack or switch out during that turn.
hydroCannon.flavorText:
The target is hit with a watery blast. The user can’t
move on the next turn.

acupressure.name: acupressure
acupressure.effectText:
Raises one of the target's stats by two stages.  The raised stat is chosen at random from any stats that can be raised by two stages.  If no stat is eligible, this move will fail.

If the target has a substitute, this move will have no effect, even if the user is the target.

This move cannot be copied by mirror move.
acupressure.flavorText:
The user applies pressure to stress points, sharply
boosting one of its or its allies’ stats.

needleArm.name: needleArm
needleArm.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to make the target flinch.
needleArm.flavorText:
The user attacks by wildly swinging its thorny arms.
This may also make the target flinch.

shockWave.name: shockWave
shockWave.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.
shockWave.flavorText:
The user strikes the target with a quick jolt of
electricity. This attack never misses.

meteorMash.name: meteorMash
meteorMash.effectText: Inflicts regular damage. Has a $effectChance% chance to raise the user's Attack one stage.
meteorMash.flavorText:
The target is hit with a hard punch fired like a
meteor. This may also raise the user’s Attack stat.

trumpCard.name: trumpCard
trumpCard.effectText:
Inflicts regular damage.  Power is determined by the PP remaining for this move, after its PP cost is deducted.  Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.

PP remaining | Power
------------ | ----:
4 or more    |    40
3            |    50
2            |    60
1            |    80
0            |   200

If this move is activated by another move, the activating move's PP is used to calculate power.
trumpCard.flavorText: The fewer PP this move has, the greater its power.

sandTomb.name: sandTomb
sandTomb.effectText:
Inflicts regular damage.  For the next 2–5 turns, the target cannot leave the field and is damaged for 1/16 its max HP at the end of each turn.  The user continues to use other moves during this time.  If the user leaves the field, this effect ends.

Has a 3/8 chance each to hit 2 or 3 times, and a 1/8 chance each to hit 4 or 5 times.  Averages to 3 hits per use.

rapid spin cancels this effect.
sandTomb.flavorText:
The user traps the target inside a harshly raging
sandstorm for four to five turns.

muddyWater.name: muddyWater
muddyWater.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to lower the target's accuracy by one stage.
muddyWater.flavorText:
The user attacks by shooting muddy water at the
opposing Pokémon. This may also lower
their accuracy.

rockTomb.name: rockTomb
rockTomb.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to lower the target's Speed by one stage.
rockTomb.flavorText:
Boulders are hurled at the target. This also lowers
the target’s Speed stat by preventing its movement.

howl.name: howl
howl.effectText: Raises the user's Attack by one stage.
howl.flavorText:
The user howls loudly to raise its spirit, which raises
its Attack stat.

leafBlade.name: leafBlade
leafBlade.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  User's critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move.
leafBlade.flavorText:
The user handles a sharp leaf like a sword and
attacks by cutting its target. Critical hits land
more easily.

nightSlash.name: nightSlash
nightSlash.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  User's critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move.
nightSlash.flavorText:
The user slashes the target the instant an
opportunity arises. Critical hits land more easily.

aerialAce.name: aerialAce
aerialAce.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.
aerialAce.flavorText:
The user confounds the target with speed, then
slashes. This attack never misses.

fling.name: fling
fling.effectText:
Inflicts regular damage.  Power and type are determined by the user's held item.  The item is consumed.  If the user is not holding an item, or its item has no set type and power, this move will fail.

This move ignores sticky hold.

If the user is under the effect of embargo, this move will fail.
fling.flavorText:
The user flings its held item at the target to attack.
This move’s power and effects depend on the item.

hail.name: hail
hail.effectText:
Changes the weather to hail for five turns, during which non-ice Pokémon are damaged for 1/16 their max HP at the end of every turn.

If the user is holding icy rock, this effect lasts for eight turns.

blizzard has 100% accuracy.  If the target has used detect or protect, blizzard has a (100 - accuracy)% chance to break through the protection.

moonlight, morning sun, and synthesis heal only 1/4 of the user's max HP.

Pokémon with snow cloak are exempt from this effect's damage.
hail.flavorText:
The user summons a hailstorm lasting five turns.
It damages all Pokémon except the Ice type.

darkPulse.name: darkPulse
darkPulse.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to make the target flinch.
darkPulse.flavorText:
The user releases a horrible aura imbued with dark
thoughts. This may also make the target flinch.

powerSwap.name: powerSwap
powerSwap.effectText: User swaps its Attack and Special Attack stat modifiers modifiers with the target.
powerSwap.flavorText:
The user employs its psychic power to switch
changes to its Attack and Sp. Atk stats with
the target.

waterPulse.name: waterPulse
waterPulse.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to confuse the target.
waterPulse.flavorText:
The user attacks the target with a pulsing blast of
water. This may also confuse the target.

luckyChant.name: luckyChant
luckyChant.effectText: For five turns, opposing Pokémon cannot score critical hits.
luckyChant.flavorText:
The user chants an incantation toward the sky,
preventing opposing Pokémon from landing
critical hits for five turns.

tailwind.name: tailwind
tailwind.effectText: For the next three turns, all Pokémon on the user's side of the field have their original Speed doubled.  This effect remains if the user leaves the field.
tailwind.flavorText:
The user whips up a turbulent whirlwind that ups
the Speed stat of the user and its allies for
four turns.

waterSport.name: waterSport
waterSport.effectText: fire moves inflict half damage, regardless of target.  If the user leaves the field, this effect ends.
waterSport.flavorText:
The user soaks the battlefield with water. This
weakens Fire-type moves for five turns.

poisonFang.name: poisonFang
poisonFang.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to badly poison the target.
poisonFang.flavorText:
The user bites the target with toxic fangs. This may
also leave the target badly poisoned.

icicleSpear.name: icicleSpear
icicleSpear.effectText:
Inflicts regular damage.  Hits 2–5 times in one turn.

Has a 3/8 chance each to hit 2 or 3 times, and a 1/8 chance each to hit 4 or 5 times.  Averages to 3 hits per use.
icicleSpear.flavorText:
The user launches sharp icicles at the target two to
five times in a row.

airCutter.name: airCutter
airCutter.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  User's critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move.
airCutter.flavorText:
The user launches razor-like wind to slash the
opposing Pokémon. Critical hits land more easily.

wringOut.name: wringOut
wringOut.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Power directly relates to the target's relative remaining HP, given by `1 + 120 * current HP / max HP`, to a maximum of 121.
wringOut.flavorText:
The user powerfully wrings the target. The more HP
the target has, the greater the move’s power.

dragonClaw.name: dragonClaw
dragonClaw.flavorText: The user slashes the target with huge sharp claws.

wakeUpSlap.name: wakeUpSlap
wakeUpSlap.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  If the target is sleeping, this move has double power, and the target wakes up.
wakeUpSlap.flavorText:
This attack inflicts big damage on a sleeping target.
This also wakes the target up, however.

magicalLeaf.name: magicalLeaf
magicalLeaf.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.
magicalLeaf.flavorText:
The user scatters curious leaves that chase the
target. This attack never misses.

forcePalm.name: forcePalm
forcePalm.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to paralyze the target.
forcePalm.flavorText:
The target is attacked with a shock wave. This may
also leave the target with paralysis.

ironDefense.name: ironDefense
ironDefense.effectText: Raises the user's Defense by two stages.
ironDefense.flavorText:
The user hardens its body’s surface like iron,
sharply raising its Defense stat.

frenzyPlant.name: frenzyPlant
frenzyPlant.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  User loses its next turn to "recharge", and cannot attack or switch out during that turn.
frenzyPlant.flavorText:
The user slams the target with an enormous tree.
The user can’t move on the next turn.

punishment.name: punishment
punishment.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Power starts at 60 and is increased by 20 for every stage any of the target's stats has been raised, capping at 200.  Accuracy and evasion modifiers do not increase this move's power.
punishment.flavorText:
The more the target has powered up with stat
changes, the greater the move’s power.

guardSwap.name: guardSwap
guardSwap.effectText: User swaps its Defense and Special Defense modifiers with the target.
guardSwap.flavorText:
The user employs its psychic power to switch
changes to its Defense and Sp. Def stats with
the target.

bulkUp.name: bulkUp
bulkUp.effectText: Raises the user's Attack and Defense by one stage each.
bulkUp.flavorText:
The user tenses its muscles to bulk up its body,
raising both its Attack and Defense stats.

iceBall.name: iceBall
iceBall.effectText:
Inflicts regular damage.  User is forced to use this move for five turns.  Power doubles every time this move is used in succession to a maximum of 16x, and resets to normal after the lock-in ends.  If this move misses or becomes unusable, the lock-in ends.

If the user has used defense curl since entering the field, this move has double power.
iceBall.flavorText:
The user attacks the target for five turns.
The move’s power increases each time it hits.

brickBreak.name: brickBreak
brickBreak.effectText: Destroys any light screen or reflect on the target's side of the field, then inflicts regular damage.
brickBreak.flavorText:
The user attacks with a swift chop. It can also break
barriers, such as Light Screen and Reflect.

aromatherapy.name: aromatherapy
aromatherapy.effectText: Removes major status effects and confusion from every Pokémon in the user's party.
aromatherapy.flavorText:
The user releases a soothing scent that heals all
status conditions affecting the user’s party.

copycat.name: copycat
copycat.effectText:
Uses the last move that was used successfully by any Pokémon, including the user.

This move cannot copy itself, nor roar nor whirlwind.

This move cannot be copied by mirror move, nor selected by assist, metronome, or sleep talk.
copycat.flavorText:
The user mimics the move used immediately before
it. The move fails if no other move has been
used yet.

poisonTail.name: poisonTail
poisonTail.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  User's critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move. Has a $effectChance% chance to poison the target.
poisonTail.flavorText:
The user hits the target with its tail. This may also
poison the target. Critical hits land more easily.

assurance.name: assurance
assurance.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  If the target takes damage this turn for any reason before this move is used, this move has double power.
assurance.flavorText:
If the target has already taken some damage in the
same turn, this attack’s power is doubled.

heartSwap.name: heartSwap
heartSwap.effectText: User swaps its stat modifiers with the target.
heartSwap.flavorText:
The user employs its psychic power to switch stat
changes with the target.

auraSphere.name: auraSphere
auraSphere.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.
auraSphere.flavorText:
The user lets loose a blast of aura power from deep
within its body at the target. This attack
never misses.

mudShot.name: mudShot
mudShot.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to lower the target's Speed by one stage.
mudShot.flavorText:
The user attacks by hurling a blob of mud at the
target. This also lowers the target’s Speed stat.

uTurn.name: uTurn
uTurn.effectText:
Inflicts regular damage, then the user immediately switches out, and the trainer selects a replacement Pokémon from the party.  If the target faints from this attack, the user's trainer selects the new Pokémon to send out first.  If the user is the last Pokémon in its party that can battle, it will not switch out.

The user may be hit by pursuit when it switches out, if it has been targeted and pursuit has not yet been used.

This move may be used even if the user is under the effect of ingrain.  ingrain's effect will end.
uTurn.flavorText:
After making its attack, the user rushes back to
switch places with a party Pokémon in waiting.

meFirst.name: meFirst
meFirst.effectText:
If the target has selected a damaging move this turn, the user will copy that move and use it against the target, with a 50% increase in power.

If the target moves before the user, this move will fail.

This move cannot be copied by mirror move, nor selected by assist, metronome, or sleep talk.
meFirst.flavorText:
The user cuts ahead of the target to copy and use
the target’s intended move with greater power.
This move fails if it isn’t used first.

rockBlast.name: rockBlast
rockBlast.effectText:
Inflicts regular damage.  Hits 2–5 times in one turn.

Has a 3/8 chance each to hit 2 or 3 times, and a 1/8 chance each to hit 4 or 5 times.  Averages to 3 hits per use.
rockBlast.flavorText:
The user hurls hard rocks at the target. Two to five
rocks are launched in a row.

bounce.name: bounce
bounce.effectText:
Inflicts regular damage.  User bounces high into the air for one turn, becoming immune to attack, and hits on the second turn.  Has a $effectChance% chance to paralyze the target.

During the immune turn, gust, hurricane, sky uppercut, smack down, thunder, and twister still hit the user normally.  gust and twister also have double power against the user.

The damage from hail and sandstorm still applies during the immune turn.

The user may be hit during its immune turn if under the effect of lock on, mind reader, or no guard.

This move cannot be used while gravity is in effect.

This move cannot be selected by sleep talk.
bounce.flavorText:
The user bounces up high, then drops on the target
on the second turn. This may also leave the target
with paralysis.

rockPolish.name: rockPolish
rockPolish.effectText: Raises the user's Speed by two stages.
rockPolish.flavorText:
The user polishes its body to reduce drag.
This can sharply raise the Speed stat.

dragonDance.name: dragonDance
dragonDance.effectText: Raises the user's Attack and Speed by one stage each.
dragonDance.flavorText:
The user vigorously performs a mystic, powerful
dance that raises its Attack and Speed stats.

miracleEye.name: miracleEye
miracleEye.effectText: Resets the target's evasion to normal and prevents any further boosting until the target leaves the field.  A dark Pokémon under this effect takes normal damage from psychic moves.  This move itself ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.
miracleEye.flavorText:
Enables a Dark-type target to be hit by
Psychic-type attacks. This also enables an evasive
target to be hit.

magnetRise.name: magnetRise
magnetRise.effectText:
For five turns, the user is immune to ground moves.

If the user is under the effect of ingrain or has levitate, this move will fail.

This effect is temporarily disabled by and cannot be used during gravity.

This effect is passed on by baton pass.
magnetRise.flavorText:
The user levitates using electrically generated
magnetism for five turns.

gravity.name: gravity
gravity.effectText:
For five turns (including this one), all immunities to ground moves are disabled.  For the duration of this effect, the evasion of every Pokémon on the field is lowered by two stages.  Cancels the effects of bounce, fly, and sky drop.

Specifically, flying Pokémon and those with levitate or that have used magnet rise are no longer immune to ground attacks, arena trap, spikes, or toxic spikes.

bounce, fly, sky drop, high jump kick, jump kick, and splash cannot be used while this move is in effect.

*Bug*: If this move is used during a double or triple battle while Pokémon are under the effect of sky drop, Sky Drop's effect is not correctly canceled on its target, and it remains high in the air indefinitely.  As Sky Drop prevents the target from acting, the only way to subsequently remove it from the field is to faint it.
gravity.flavorText:
Enables Flying-type Pokémon or Pokémon with the
Levitate Ability to be hit by Ground-type moves.
Flying moves can’t be used.

metalBurst.name: metalBurst
metalBurst.effectText: Targets the last opposing Pokémon to hit the user with a damaging move this turn.  Inflicts 1.5× the damage that move did to the user.  If there is no eligible target, this move will fail.  Type immunity applies, but other type effects are ignored.
metalBurst.flavorText:
The user retaliates with much greater force against
the opponent that last inflicted damage on it.

extrasensory.name: extrasensory
extrasensory.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to make the target flinch.
extrasensory.flavorText:
The user attacks with an odd, unseeable power.
This may also make the target flinch.

worrySeed.name: worrySeed
worrySeed.effectText:
Changes the target's ability to insomnia.

If the target's ability is truant or multitype, this move will fail.
worrySeed.flavorText:
A seed that causes worry is planted on the target.
It prevents sleep by making the target’s
Ability Insomnia.

payback.name: payback
payback.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  If the target uses a move or switches out this turn before this move is used, this move has double power.
payback.flavorText:
The user stores power, then attacks. If the user
moves after the target, this attack’s power will
be doubled.

feint.name: feint
feint.effectText:
Inflicts regular damage.  Removes the effects of detect or protect from the target before hitting.

This move cannot be copied by mirror move, nor selected by assist or metronome.
feint.flavorText:
This attack hits a target using a move such as
Protect or Detect.
This also lifts the effects of those moves.

aquaRing.name: aquaRing
aquaRing.effectText:
Restores 1/16 of the user's max HP at the end of each turn.  If the user leaves the field, this effect ends.

This effect is passed on by baton pass.
aquaRing.flavorText:
The user envelops itself in a veil made of water.
It regains some HP every turn.

toxicSpikes.name: toxicSpikes
toxicSpikes.effectText:
Scatters poisoned spikes around the opposing field, which poison opposing Pokémon that enter the field.  A second layer of these spikes may be laid down, in which case Pokémon will be badly poisoned instead.  Pokémon immune to either ground moves or being poisoned are immune to this effect.  Pokémon otherwise immune to ground moves are affected during gravity.

If a poison Pokémon not immune to ground moves enters a field covered with poisoned spikes, the spikes are removed.

rapid spin will remove this effect from its user's side of the field.  defog will remove this effect from its target's side of the field.

This move does not trigger synchronize, unless the Pokémon with synchronize was forced to enter the field by another effect such as roar.

Pokémon entering the field due to baton pass are not affected by this effect.
toxicSpikes.flavorText:
The user lays a trap of poison spikes at the feet of
the opposing team. The spikes will poison opposing
Pokémon that switch into battle.

powerTrick.name: powerTrick
powerTrick.effectText:
The user's original Attack and Defense are swapped.

This effect is passed on by baton pass.
powerTrick.flavorText:
The user employs its psychic power to switch its
Attack stat with its Defense stat.

closeCombat.name: closeCombat
closeCombat.effectText: Inflicts regular damage, then lowers the user's Defense and Special Defense by one stage each.
closeCombat.flavorText:
The user fights the target up close without guarding
itself. This also lowers the user’s Defense and
Sp. Def stats.

healBlock.name: healBlock
healBlock.effectText: For the next five turns, the target may not use any moves that only restore HP, and move effects that heal the target are disabled.  Moves that steal HP may still be used, but will only inflict damage and not heal the target.
healBlock.flavorText:
For five turns, the user prevents the opposing team
from using any moves, Abilities, or held items that
recover HP.

healingWish.name: healingWish
healingWish.effectText: User faints.  Its replacement's HP is fully restored, and any major status effect is removed.  If the replacement Pokémon is immediately fainted by a switch-in effect, the next replacement is healed by this move instead.
healingWish.flavorText:
The user faints. In return, the Pokémon taking its
place will have its HP restored and status
conditions cured.

suckerPunch.name: suckerPunch
suckerPunch.effectText:
Inflicts regular damage.  If the target has not selected a damaging move this turn, or if the target has already acted this turn, this move will fail.

This move is not affected by iron fist.
suckerPunch.flavorText:
This move enables the user to attack first. This move
fails if the target is not readying an attack.

dragonPulse.name: dragonPulse
dragonPulse.flavorText:
The target is attacked with a shock wave generated
by the user’s gaping mouth.

aquaTail.name: aquaTail
aquaTail.flavorText:
The user attacks by swinging its tail as if it were a
vicious wave in a raging storm.

seedBomb.name: seedBomb
seedBomb.flavorText:
The user slams a barrage of hard-shelled seeds
down on the target from above.

dragonRush.name: dragonRush
dragonRush.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to make the target flinch.
dragonRush.flavorText:
The user tackles the target while exhibiting
overwhelming menace. This may also make the
target flinch.

xScissor.name: xScissor
xScissor.flavorText:
The user slashes at the target by crossing its
scythes or claws as if they were a pair of scissors.

energyBall.name: energyBall
energyBall.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by one stage.
energyBall.flavorText:
The user draws power from nature and fires it at the
target. This may also lower the target’s Sp. Def stat.

switcheroo.name: switcheroo
switcheroo.effectText:
User and target permanently swap held items.  Works even if one of the Pokémon isn't holding anything.  If either Pokémon is holding mail, this move will fail.

If either Pokémon has multitype or sticky hold, this move will fail.

If this move results in a Pokémon obtaining choice band, choice scarf, or choice specs, and that Pokémon was the latter of the pair to move this turn, then the move it used this turn becomes its chosen forced move.  This applies even if both Pokémon had a choice item before this move was used.  If the first of the two Pokémon gains a choice item, it may select whatever choice move it wishes next turn.

Neither the user nor the target can recover its item with recycle.

This move cannot be selected by assist or metronome.
switcheroo.flavorText:
The user trades held items with the target faster
than the eye can follow.

airSlash.name: airSlash
airSlash.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to make the target flinch.
airSlash.flavorText:
The user attacks with a blade of air that slices even
the sky. This may also make the target flinch.

powerGem.name: powerGem
powerGem.flavorText:
The user attacks with a ray of light that sparkles as
if it were made of gemstones.

shadowClaw.name: shadowClaw
shadowClaw.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  User's critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move.
shadowClaw.flavorText:
The user slashes with a sharp claw made from
shadows. Critical hits land more easily.

bulletPunch.name: bulletPunch
bulletPunch.flavorText:
The user strikes the target with tough punches as
fast as bullets. This move always goes first.

braveBird.name: braveBird
braveBird.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  User takes 1/3 the damage it inflicts in recoil.
braveBird.flavorText:
The user tucks in its wings and charges from a low
altitude. This also damages the user quite a lot.

earthPower.name: earthPower
earthPower.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by one stage.
earthPower.flavorText:
The user makes the ground under the target erupt
with power. This may also lower the target’s 
Sp. Def stat.

vacuumWave.name: vacuumWave
vacuumWave.flavorText:
The user whirls its fists to send a wave of pure
vacuum at the target. This move always goes first.

avalanche.name: avalanche
avalanche.effectText:
Inflicts regular damage.  If the target damaged the user this turn and was the last to do so, this move has double power.

pain split does not count as damaging the user.
avalanche.flavorText:
The power of this attack move is doubled if the user
has been hurt by the target in the same turn.

drainPunch.name: drainPunch
drainPunch.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.
drainPunch.flavorText:
An energy-draining punch. The user’s HP is restored
by half the damage taken by the target.

bugBuzz.name: bugBuzz
bugBuzz.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by one stage.
bugBuzz.flavorText:
The user generates a damaging sound wave by
vibration. This may also lower the target’s
Sp. Def stat.

focusBlast.name: focusBlast
focusBlast.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by one stage.
focusBlast.flavorText:
The user heightens its mental focus and unleashes
its power. This may also lower the target’s 
Sp. Def stat.

gigaImpact.name: gigaImpact
gigaImpact.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  User loses its next turn to "recharge", and cannot attack or switch out during that turn.
gigaImpact.flavorText:
The user charges at the target using every bit of its
power. The user can’t move on the next turn.

nastyPlot.name: nastyPlot
nastyPlot.effectText: Raises the user's Special Attack by two stages.
nastyPlot.flavorText:
The user stimulates its brain by thinking bad
thoughts. This sharply raises the user’s Sp. Atk stat.

fireFang.name: fireFang
fireFang.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to burn the target and a separate $effectChance% chance to make the target flinch.
fireFang.flavorText:
The user bites with flame-cloaked fangs. This may
also make the target flinch or leave it with a burn.

zenHeadbutt.name: zenHeadbutt
zenHeadbutt.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to make the target flinch.
zenHeadbutt.flavorText:
The user focuses its willpower to its head and
attacks the target. This may also make the
target flinch.

thunderFang.name: thunderFang
thunderFang.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to paralyze the target and a separate $effectChance% chance to make the target flinch.
thunderFang.flavorText:
The user bites with electrified fangs. This may also
make the target flinch or leave it with paralysis.

iceShard.name: iceShard
iceShard.flavorText:
The user flash-freezes chunks of ice and hurls them
at the target. This move always goes first.

shadowSneak.name: shadowSneak
shadowSneak.flavorText:
The user extends its shadow and attacks the target
from behind. This move always goes first.

iceFang.name: iceFang
iceFang.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to freeze the target and a separate $effectChance% chance to make the target flinch.
iceFang.flavorText:
The user bites with cold-infused fangs. This may
also make the target flinch or leave it frozen.

trickRoom.name: trickRoom
trickRoom.effectText:
For five turns (including this one), slower Pokémon will act before faster Pokémon.  Move priority is not affected.  Using this move when its effect is already active will end the effect.

Pokémon holding full incense, lagging tail, or quick claw and Pokémon with stall ignore this effect.
trickRoom.flavorText:
The user creates a bizarre area in which slower
Pokémon get to move first for five turns.

rockClimb.name: rockClimb
rockClimb.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to confuse the target.
rockClimb.flavorText:
The user attacks the target by smashing into it with
incredible force. This may also confuse the target.

mirrorShot.name: mirrorShot
mirrorShot.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to lower the target's accuracy by one stage.
mirrorShot.flavorText:
The user lets loose a flash of energy at the target
from its polished body. This may also lower the
target’s accuracy.

mudBomb.name: mudBomb
mudBomb.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to lower the target's accuracy by one stage.
mudBomb.flavorText:
The user launches a hard-packed mud ball to attack.
This may also lower the target’s accuracy.

dracoMeteor.name: dracoMeteor
dracoMeteor.effectText: Inflicts regular damage, then lowers the user's Special Attack by two stages.
dracoMeteor.flavorText:
Comets are summoned down from the sky onto the
target. The attack’s recoil harshly lowers the user’s
Sp. Atk stat.

psychoCut.name: psychoCut
psychoCut.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  User's critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move.
psychoCut.flavorText:
The user tears at the target with blades formed by
psychic power. Critical hits land more easily.

lavaPlume.name: lavaPlume
lavaPlume.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to burn the target.
lavaPlume.flavorText:
The user torches everything around it in an inferno
of scarlet flames. This may also leave those it hits
with a burn.

leafStorm.name: leafStorm
leafStorm.effectText: Inflicts regular damage, then lowers the user's Special Attack by two stages.
leafStorm.flavorText:
The user whips up a storm of leaves around the
target. The attack’s recoil harshly lowers the user’s
Sp. Atk stat.

rockWrecker.name: rockWrecker
rockWrecker.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  User loses its next turn to "recharge", and cannot attack or switch out during that turn.
rockWrecker.flavorText:
The user launches a huge boulder at the target to
attack. The user can’t move on the next turn.

defog.name: defog
defog.effectText:
Lowers the target's evasion by one stage.  Clears away fog.  Removes the effects of mist, light screen, reflect, safeguard, spikes, stealth rock, and toxic spikes from the target's side of the field.

If the target is protected by mist, it will prevent the evasion change, then be removed by this move.
defog.flavorText:
A strong wind blows away the target’s barriers such
as Reflect or Light Screen. This also lowers the
target’s evasiveness.

flashCannon.name: flashCannon
flashCannon.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by one stage.
flashCannon.flavorText:
The user gathers all its light energy and releases it
all at once. This may also lower the target’s
Sp. Def stat.

discharge.name: discharge
discharge.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to paralyze the target.
discharge.flavorText:
The user strikes everything around it by letting loose
a flare of electricity. This may also cause paralysis.

powerWhip.name: powerWhip
powerWhip.flavorText:
The user violently whirls its vines, tentacles, or the 
like to harshly lash the target.

crossPoison.name: crossPoison
crossPoison.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  User's critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move. Has a $effectChance% chance to poison the target.
crossPoison.flavorText:
A slashing attack with a poisonous blade that may
also poison the target. Critical hits land more easily.

woodHammer.name: woodHammer
woodHammer.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  User takes 1/3 the damage it inflicts in recoil.
woodHammer.flavorText:
The user slams its rugged body into the target to
attack. This also damages the user quite a lot.

chatter.name: chatter
chatter.effectText:
Inflicts regular damage.  Has either a 1%, 11%, or 31% chance to confuse the target, based on the volume of the recording made for this move; louder recordings increase the chance of confusion.  If the user is not a chatot, this move will not cause confusion.

This move cannot be copied by mimic, mirror move, or sketch, nor selected by assist, metronome, or sleep talk.
chatter.flavorText:
The user attacks the target with sound waves of
deafening chatter. This confuses the target.

stealthRock.name: stealthRock
stealthRock.effectText:
Spreads sharp rocks around the opposing field, damaging any Pokémon that enters the field for 1/8 its max HP.  This damage is affected by the entering Pokémon's susceptibility to rock moves.

rapid spin removes this effect from its user's side of the field.
stealthRock.flavorText:
The user lays a trap of levitating stones around the
opposing team. The trap hurts opposing Pokémon
that switch into battle.

ironHead.name: ironHead
ironHead.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to make the target flinch.
ironHead.flavorText:
The user slams the target with its steel-hard head.
This may also make the target flinch.

gunkShot.name: gunkShot
gunkShot.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to poison the target.
gunkShot.flavorText:
The user shoots filthy garbage at the target to
attack. This may also poison the target.

chargeBeam.name: chargeBeam
chargeBeam.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to raise the user's Special Attack by one stage.
chargeBeam.flavorText:
The user attacks with an electric charge. The user
may use any remaining electricity to raise its
Sp. Atk stat.

aquaJet.name: aquaJet
aquaJet.flavorText:
The user lunges at the target at a speed that makes
it almost invisible. This move always goes first.

magnetBomb.name: magnetBomb
magnetBomb.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.
magnetBomb.flavorText:
The user launches steel bombs that stick to the
target. This attack never misses.

defendOrder.name: defendOrder
defendOrder.effectText: Raises the user's Defense and Special Defense by one stage.
defendOrder.flavorText:
The user calls out its underlings to shield its body,
raising its Defense and Sp. Def stats.

headSmash.name: headSmash
headSmash.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  User takes 1/2 the damage it inflicts in recoil.
headSmash.flavorText:
The user attacks the target with a hazardous,
full-power headbutt. This also damages the
user terribly.

captivate.name: captivate
captivate.effectText: Lowers the target's Special Attack by two stages.  If the user and target are the same gender, or either is genderless, this move will fail.
captivate.flavorText:
If any opposing Pokémon is the opposite gender of
the user, it is charmed, which harshly lowers its
Sp. Atk stat.

attackOrder.name: attackOrder
attackOrder.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  User's critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move.
attackOrder.flavorText:
The user calls out its underlings to pummel the
target. Critical hits land more easily.

stoneEdge.name: stoneEdge
stoneEdge.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  User's critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move.
stoneEdge.flavorText:
The user stabs the target from below with
sharpened stones. Critical hits land more easily.

judgment.name: judgment
judgment.effectText:
Inflicts regular damage.  If the user is holding a plate or a drive, this move's type is the type corresponding to that item.

Note: This effect is technically shared by both techno blast and judgment; however, Techno Blast is only affected by drives, and Judgment is only affected by plates.
judgment.flavorText:
The user releases countless shots of light at the
target. This move’s type varies depending on the
kind of Plate the user is holding.

grassKnot.name: grassKnot
grassKnot.effectText:
Inflicts regular damage.  Power increases with the target's weight in kilograms, to a maximum of 120.

Target's weight | Power
--------------- | ----:
Up to 10kg      |    20
Up to 25kg      |    40
Up to 50kg      |    60
Up to 100kg     |    80
Up to 200kg     |   100
Above 200kg     |   120
grassKnot.flavorText:
The user snares the target with grass and trips it.
The heavier the target, the greater the
move’s power.

telekinesis.name: telekinesis
telekinesis.effectText:
For three turns (including this one), moves used against the target have 100% accuracy, but the target is immune to ground damage.  Accuracy of one-hit KO moves is exempt from this effect.

This effect is removed by gravity.  If Gravity is already in effect, this move will fail.
telekinesis.flavorText:
The user makes the target float with its psychic
power. The target is easier to hit for three turns.

roarOfTime.name: roarOfTime
roarOfTime.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  User loses its next turn to "recharge", and cannot attack or switch out during that turn.
roarOfTime.flavorText:
The user blasts the target with power that distorts
even time. The user can’t move on the next turn.

powerSplit.name: powerSplit
powerSplit.effectText:
Averages the user's unmodified Attack with the target's unmodified Attack; the value becomes the unmodified Attack for both Pokémon. Unmodified Special Attack is averaged the same way.

This effect applies before any other persistent changes to unmodified Attack or Special Attack, such as flower gift during sunny day.
powerSplit.flavorText:
The user employs its psychic power to average its
Attack and Sp. Atk stats with those of the target.

crushGrip.name: crushGrip
crushGrip.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Power directly relates to the target's relative remaining HP, given by `1 + 120 * current HP / max HP`, to a maximum of 121.
crushGrip.flavorText:
The target is crushed with great force. The more HP
the target has left, the greater this move’s power.

magicRoom.name: magicRoom
magicRoom.effectText: For five turns (including this one), passive effects of held items are ignored, and Pokémon will not use their held items.
magicRoom.flavorText:
The user creates a bizarre area in which Pokémon’s
held items lose their effects for five turns.

darkVoid.name: darkVoid
darkVoid.flavorText:
Opposing Pokémon are dragged into a world of total
darkness that makes them sleep.

lunarDance.name: lunarDance
lunarDance.effectText: User faints.  Its replacement's HP and PP are fully restored, and any major status effect is removed.
lunarDance.flavorText:
The user faints. In return, the Pokémon taking its
place will have its status and HP fully restored.

guardSplit.name: guardSplit
guardSplit.effectText: Averages the user's unmodified Defense with the target's unmodified Defense; the value becomes the unmodified Defense for both Pokémon. Unmodified Special Defense is averaged the same way.
guardSplit.flavorText:
The user employs its psychic power to average its
Defense and Sp. Def stats with those of the target.

stormThrow.name: stormThrow
stormThrow.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Always scores a critical hit.
stormThrow.flavorText:
The user strikes the target with a fierce blow. This
attack always results in a critical hit.

autotomize.name: autotomize
autotomize.effectText: Raises the user's Speed by two stages.  Halves the user's weight; this effect does not stack.
autotomize.flavorText:
The user sheds part of its body to make itself lighter
and sharply raise its Speed stat.

healOrder.name: healOrder
healOrder.effectText: Heals the user for half its max HP.
healOrder.flavorText:
The user calls out its underlings to heal it. The user
regains up to half of its max HP.

bugBite.name: bugBite
bugBite.effectText:
Inflicts regular damage.  If the target is holding a berry, this move has double power, and the user takes the berry and uses it immediately.

If the target is holding a jaboca berry or rowap berry, the berry is still removed, but has no effect.

If this move is super effective and the target is holding a berry that can reduce this move's damage, it will do so, and will not be stolen.
bugBite.flavorText:
The user bites the target. If the target is holding a
