Berry, the user eats it and gains its effect.

doubleHit.name: doubleHit
doubleHit.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Hits twice in one turn.
doubleHit.flavorText:
The user slams the target with a long tail, vines, or a
tentacle. The target is hit twice in a row.

smackDown.name: smackDown
smackDown.effectText:
Inflicts regular damage.  Removes the target's immunity to ground-type damage.  This effect removes any existing Ground immunity due to levitate, magnet rise, or telekinesis, and causes the target's flying type to be ignored when it takes Ground damage.

If the target isn't immune to Ground damage, this move will fail.

This move can hit Pokémon under the effect of bounce, fly, or sky drop, and ends the effect of Bounce or Fly.
smackDown.flavorText:
The user throws a stone or similar projectile to
attack an opponent. A flying Pokémon will fall to the
ground when it’s hit.

spacialRend.name: spacialRend
spacialRend.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  User's critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move.
spacialRend.flavorText:
The user tears the target along with the space
around it. Critical hits land more easily.

ragePowder.name: ragePowder
ragePowder.effectText:
Until the end of this turn, any moves that opposing Pokémon target solely at the user's ally will instead target the user.  If both Pokémon on the same side of the field use this move on the same turn, the Pokémon that uses it last will become the target.

This effect takes priority over lightning rod and storm drain.

If the user's ally switches out, opposing Pokémon may still hit it with pursuit.

This move cannot be selected by assist or metronome.
ragePowder.flavorText:
The user scatters a cloud of irritating powder to
draw attention to itself. Opponents aim only at
the user.

venoshock.name: venoshock
venoshock.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  If the target is poisoned, this move has double power.
venoshock.flavorText:
The user drenches the target in a special poisonous
liquid. This move’s power is doubled if the target
is poisoned.

sludgeWave.name: sludgeWave
sludgeWave.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to poison the target.
sludgeWave.flavorText:
The user strikes everything around it by swamping
the area with a giant sludge wave. This may also
poison those hit.

seedFlare.name: seedFlare
seedFlare.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by two stages.
seedFlare.flavorText:
The user emits a shock wave from its body to attack
its target. This may also harshly lower the target’s
Sp. Def stat.

honeClaws.name: honeClaws
honeClaws.effectText: Raises the user's Attack and accuracy by one stage.
honeClaws.flavorText:
The user sharpens its claws to boost its Attack stat
and accuracy.

wideGuard.name: wideGuard
wideGuard.effectText:
Moves with multiple targets will not hit friendly Pokémon for the remainder of this turn.  If the user is last to act this turn, this move will fail.

This move cannot be selected by assist or metronome.
wideGuard.flavorText:
The user and its allies are protected from
wide-ranging attacks for one turn.

magmaStorm.name: magmaStorm
magmaStorm.effectText:
Inflicts regular damage.  For the next 2–5 turns, the target cannot leave the field and is damaged for 1/16 its max HP at the end of each turn.  The user continues to use other moves during this time.  If the user leaves the field, this effect ends.

Has a 3/8 chance each to hit 2 or 3 times, and a 1/8 chance each to hit 4 or 5 times.  Averages to 3 hits per use.

rapid spin cancels this effect.
magmaStorm.flavorText:
The target becomes trapped within a maelstrom of
fire that rages for four to five turns.

wonderRoom.name: wonderRoom
wonderRoom.effectText: For five turns (including this one), every Pokémon's Defense and Special Defense are swapped.
wonderRoom.flavorText:
The user creates a bizarre area in which Pokémon’s
Defense and Sp. Def stats are swapped for
five turns.

shadowForce.name: shadowForce
shadowForce.effectText:
Inflicts regular damage.  User vanishes for one turn, becoming immune to attack, and hits on the second turn.

This move ignores the effects of detect and protect.

This move cannot be selected by sleep talk.
shadowForce.flavorText:
The user disappears, then strikes the target on the
next turn. This move hits even if the target
protects itself.

heavySlam.name: heavySlam
heavySlam.effectText:
Inflicts regular damage.  The greater the user's weight compared to the target's, the higher power this move has, to a maximum of 120.

User's weight                    | Power
-------------------------------- | ----:
Up to 2× the target's weight     |    40
Up to 3× the target's weight     |    60
Up to 4× the target's weight     |    80
Up to 5× the target's weight     |   100
More than 5× the target's weight |   120
heavySlam.flavorText:
The user slams into the target with its heavy body.
The more the user outweighs the target, the greater
the move’s power.

synchronoise.name: synchronoise
synchronoise.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Only Pokémon that share a type with the user will take damage from this move.
synchronoise.flavorText:
Using an odd shock wave, the user inflicts damage
on any Pokémon of the same type in the area
around it.

psyshock.name: psyshock
psyshock.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Damage calculation always uses the target's Defense, regardless of this move's damage class.
psyshock.flavorText:
The user materializes an odd psychic wave to attack
the target. This attack does physical damage.

quiverDance.name: quiverDance
quiverDance.effectText: Raises the user's Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by one stage each.
quiverDance.flavorText:
The user lightly performs a beautiful, mystic dance.
This boosts the user’s Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and
Speed stats.

ominousWind.name: ominousWind
ominousWind.effectText: Inflicts regular damage. Has a $effectChance% chance to raise all of the user's stats one stage.
ominousWind.flavorText:
The user blasts the target with a gust of repulsive
wind. This may also raise all the user’s stats at once.

flameBurst.name: flameBurst
flameBurst.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  If this move successfully hits the target, any Pokémon adjacent to the target are damaged for 1/16 their max HP.
flameBurst.flavorText:
The user attacks the target with a bursting flame.
The bursting flame damages Pokémon next to the
target as well.

electroBall.name: electroBall
electroBall.effectText:
Inflicts regular damage.  The greater the user's Speed compared to the target's, the higher power this move has, to a maximum of 150.

User's Speed                     | Power
-------------------------------- | ----:
Up to 2× the target's Speed      |    60
Up to 3× the target's Speed      |    80
Up to 4× the target's Speed      |   120
More than 4× the target's Speed  |   150
electroBall.flavorText:
The user hurls an electric orb at the target. The
faster the user is than the target, the greater the
move’s power.

coil.name: coil
coil.effectText: Raises the user's Attack, Defense, and accuracy by one stage each.
coil.flavorText:
The user coils up and concentrates. This raises its
Attack and Defense stats as well as its accuracy.

flameCharge.name: flameCharge
flameCharge.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Raises the user's Speed by one stage.
flameCharge.flavorText:
Cloaking itself in flame, the user attacks. Then,
building up more power, the user raises its
Speed stat.

soak.name: soak
soak.effectText: Changes the target to pure water-type until it leaves the field.  If the target has multitype, this move will fail.
soak.flavorText:
The user shoots a torrent of water at the target and
changes the target’s type to Water.

echoedVoice.name: echoedVoice
echoedVoice.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  If any friendly Pokémon used this move earlier this turn or on the previous turn, that use's power is added to this move's power, to a maximum of 200.
echoedVoice.flavorText:
The user attacks the target with an echoing voice.
If this move is used every turn, its power
is increased.

foulPlay.name: foulPlay
foulPlay.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Damage is calculated using the target's attacking stat rather than the user's.
foulPlay.flavorText:
The user turns the target’s power against it. The
higher the target’s Attack stat, the greater the
move’s power.

lowSweep.name: lowSweep
lowSweep.effectText: Lowers the target's Speed by one stage.
lowSweep.flavorText:
The user makes a swift attack on the target’s legs,
which lowers the target’s Speed stat.

acidSpray.name: acidSpray
acidSpray.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Lowers the target's Special Defense by two stages.
acidSpray.flavorText:
The user spits fluid that works to melt the target.
This harshly lowers the target’s Sp. Def stat.

entrainment.name: entrainment
entrainment.effectText: Changes the target's ability to match the user's.  This effect ends when the target leaves battle.
entrainment.flavorText:
The user dances with an odd rhythm that compels
the target to mimic it, making the target’s Ability
the same as the user’s.

afterYou.name: afterYou
afterYou.effectText:
The target will act next this turn, regardless of Speed or move priority.
If the target has already acted this turn, this move will fail.
afterYou.flavorText:
The user helps the target and makes it use its move
right after the user.

chipAway.name: chipAway
chipAway.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Damage calculation ignores the target's stat modifiers, including evasion.
chipAway.flavorText:
Looking for an opening, the user strikes consistently.
The target’s stat changes don’t affect this
attack’s damage.

simpleBeam.name: simpleBeam
simpleBeam.effectText: Changes the target's ability to simple.
simpleBeam.flavorText:
The user’s mysterious psychic wave changes the
target’s Ability to Simple.

round.name: round
round.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  If round has already been used this turn, this move's power is doubled.  After this move is used, any other Pokémon using it this turn will immediately do so (in the order they would otherwise act), regardless of Speed or priority.  Pokémon using other moves will then continue to act as usual.
round.flavorText:
The user attacks the target with a song. Others can
join in the Round to increase the power of
the attack.

clearSmog.name: clearSmog
clearSmog.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  All of the target's stat modifiers are reset to zero.
clearSmog.flavorText:
The user attacks by throwing a clump of special
mud. All stat changes are returned to normal.

allySwitch.name: allySwitch
allySwitch.effectText: User switches position on the field with the friendly Pokémon opposite it.  If the user is in the middle position in a triple battle, or there are no other friendly Pokémon, this move will fail.
allySwitch.flavorText:
The user teleports using a strange power and
switches places with one of its allies.

shiftGear.name: shiftGear
shiftGear.effectText: Raises the user's Attack by one stage and its Speed by two stages.
shiftGear.flavorText:
The user rotates its gears, raising its Attack stat and
sharply raising its Speed stat.

skyDrop.name: skyDrop
skyDrop.effectText:
Inflicts regular damage.  User carries the target high into the air for one turn, during which no moves will hit either Pokémon and neither can act.  On the following turn, the user drops the target, inflicting damage and ending the effect.

If the target is flying-type, this move will function as normal but inflict no damage.

gust, hurricane, sky uppercut, smack down, thunder, twister, and whirlwind can hit both the user and the target during this effect.  gust and twister will additionally have double power.

The damage from hail and sandstorm still applies during this effect.

Either Pokémon may be hit during this effect if also under the effect of lock on, mind reader, or no guard.

This move cannot be used while gravity is in effect.

This move cannot be selected by sleep talk.

*Bug*: If gravity is used during a double or triple battle while this move is in effect, this move is not correctly canceled on the target, and it remains high in the air indefinitely.  As this move prevents the target from acting, the only way to subsequently remove it from the field is to faint it.
skyDrop.flavorText:
The user takes the target into the sky, then drops it
during the next turn. The target cannot attack while
in the sky.

shellSmash.name: shellSmash
shellSmash.effectText: Raises the user's Attack, Special Attack, and Speed by two stages each.  Lowers the user's Defense and Special Defense by one stage each.
shellSmash.flavorText:
The user breaks its shell, which lowers Defense and
Sp. Def stats but sharply raises its Attack, Sp. Atk,
and Speed stats.

incinerate.name: incinerate
incinerate.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  If the target is holding a berry, it's destroyed and cannot be used in response to this move.
incinerate.flavorText:
The user attacks opposing Pokémon with fire.
If a Pokémon is holding a certain item, such as a
Berry, the item becomes burned up and unusable.

acrobatics.name: acrobatics
acrobatics.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  If the user has no held item, this move has double power.
acrobatics.flavorText:
The user nimbly strikes the target. If the user is not
holding an item, this attack inflicts massive damage.

bestow.name: bestow
bestow.effectText: Transfers the user's held item to the target.  If the user has no held item, or the target already has a held item, this move will fail.
bestow.flavorText:
The user passes its held item to the target when the
target isn’t holding an item.

finalGambit.name: finalGambit
finalGambit.effectText: Inflicts damage equal to the user's remaining HP.  User faints.
finalGambit.flavorText:
The user risks everything to attack its target. The
user faints but does damage equal to its HP.

storedPower.name: storedPower
storedPower.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Power is increased by 100% its original value for every stage any of the user's stats have been raised.  Accuracy, evasion, and lowered stats do not affect this move's power.  For a Pokémon with all five stats modified to +6, this move's power is 31×.
storedPower.flavorText:
The user attacks the target with stored power. The
more the user’s stats are raised, the greater the
move’s power.

quickGuard.name: quickGuard
quickGuard.effectText:
Moves with priority greater than 0 will not hit friendly Pokémon for the remainder of this turn.  If the user is last to act this turn, this move will fail.

This move cannot be selected by assist or metronome.
quickGuard.flavorText:
The user protects itself and its allies from
priority moves.

circleThrow.name: circleThrow
circleThrow.effectText:
Inflicts regular damage, then switches the target out for another of its trainer's Pokémon, selected at random.

If the target is under the effect of ingrain or suction cups, or it has a substitute, or its Trainer has no more usable Pokémon, it will not be switched out.  If the target is a wild Pokémon, the battle ends instead.
circleThrow.flavorText:
The target is thrown, and a different Pokémon is
dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against
a single Pokémon.

reflectType.name: reflectType
reflectType.effectText: User's type changes to match the target's.
reflectType.flavorText:
The user reflects the target’s type, making it the
same type as the target.

scald.name: scald
scald.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to burn the target.
scald.flavorText:
The user shoots boiling hot water at its target.
This may also leave the target with a burn.

waterPledge.name: waterPledge
waterPledge.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  If a friendly Pokémon used grass pledge earlier this turn, all opposing Pokémon have halved Speed for four turns (including this one).
waterPledge.flavorText:
A column of water strikes the target. When combined
with its fire equivalent, its power increases and a
rainbow appears.

quash.name: quash
quash.effectText: Forces the target to act last this turn, regardless of Speed or move priority.  If the target has already acted this turn, this move will fail.
quash.flavorText:
The user suppresses the target and makes its move
go last.

healPulse.name: healPulse
healPulse.effectText: Heals the target for half its max HP.
healPulse.flavorText:
The user emits a healing pulse that restores the
target’s HP by up to half of its max HP.

inferno.name: inferno
inferno.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to burn the target.
inferno.flavorText:
The user attacks by engulfing the target in an
intense fire. This leaves the target with a burn.

hex.name: hex
hex.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  If the target has a major status ailment, this move has double power.
hex.flavorText:
This relentless attack does massive damage to a
target affected by status conditions.

retaliate.name: retaliate
retaliate.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  If a friendly Pokémon fainted on the previous turn, this move has double power.
retaliate.flavorText:
The user gets revenge for a fainted ally. If an ally
fainted in the previous turn, this move’s power
is increased.

struggleBug.name: struggleBug
struggleBug.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to lower the target's Special Attack by one stage.
struggleBug.flavorText:
While resisting, the user attacks the opposing
Pokémon. This lowers the Sp. Atk stat of those hit.

fieryDance.name: fieryDance
fieryDance.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to raise the user's Special Attack by one stage.
fieryDance.flavorText:
Cloaked in flames, the user dances and flaps its
wings. This may also raise the user’s Sp. Atk stat.

dragonTail.name: dragonTail
dragonTail.effectText:
Inflicts regular damage, then switches the target out for another of its trainer's Pokémon, selected at random.

If the target is under the effect of ingrain or suction cups, or it has a substitute, or its Trainer has no more usable Pokémon, it will not be switched out.  If the target is a wild Pokémon, the battle ends instead.
dragonTail.flavorText:
The target is knocked away, and a different Pokémon
is dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against
a single Pokémon.

hornLeech.name: hornLeech
hornLeech.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.
hornLeech.flavorText:
The user drains the target’s energy with its horns.
The user’s HP is restored by half the damage taken
by the target.

voltSwitch.name: voltSwitch
voltSwitch.effectText:
Inflicts regular damage, then the user immediately switches out, and the trainer selects a replacement Pokémon from the party.  If the target faints from this attack, the user's trainer selects the new Pokémon to send out first.  If the user is the last Pokémon in its party that can battle, it will not switch out.

The user may be hit by pursuit when it switches out, if it has been targeted and pursuit has not yet been used.

This move may be used even if the user is under the effect of ingrain.  ingrain's effect will end.
voltSwitch.flavorText:
After making its attack, the user rushes back to
switch places with a party Pokémon in waiting.

leafTornado.name: leafTornado
leafTornado.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to lower the target's accuracy by one stage.
leafTornado.flavorText:
The user attacks its target by encircling it in sharp
leaves. This attack may also lower the
target’s accuracy.

firePledge.name: firePledge
firePledge.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  If a friendly Pokémon used water pledge earlier this turn, moves used by any friendly Pokémon have doubled effect chance for four turns (including this one).
firePledge.flavorText:
A column of fire hits the target. When used with its
grass equivalent, its power increases and a vast sea
of fire appears.

frostBreath.name: frostBreath
frostBreath.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Always scores a critical hit.
frostBreath.flavorText:
The user blows its cold breath on the target. This
attack always results in a critical hit.

heatCrash.name: heatCrash
heatCrash.effectText:
Inflicts regular damage.  The greater the user's weight compared to the target's, the higher power this move has, to a maximum of 120.

User's weight                    | Power
-------------------------------- | ----:
Up to 2× the target's weight     |    40
Up to 3× the target's weight     |    60
Up to 4× the target's weight     |    80
Up to 5× the target's weight     |   100
More than 5× the target's weight |   120
heatCrash.flavorText:
The user slams its target with its flame-covered
body. The more the user outweighs the target, the
greater the move’s power.

dualChop.name: dualChop
dualChop.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Hits twice in one turn.
dualChop.flavorText:
The user attacks its target by hitting it with brutal
strikes. The target is hit twice in a row.

heartStamp.name: heartStamp
heartStamp.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to make the target flinch.
heartStamp.flavorText:
The user unleashes a vicious blow after its cute act
makes the target less wary. This may also make the
target flinch.

wildCharge.name: wildCharge
wildCharge.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  User takes 1/4 the damage it inflicts in recoil.
wildCharge.flavorText:
The user shrouds itself in electricity and smashes
into its target. This also damages the user a little.

steamroller.name: steamroller
steamroller.effectText:
Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to make the target flinch.

Power is doubled against Pokémon that have used minimize since entering the field.
steamroller.flavorText:
The user crushes its target by rolling over the target
with its rolled-up body. This may also make the
target flinch.

electroweb.name: electroweb
electroweb.effectText: Lowers the target's Speed by one stage.
electroweb.flavorText:
The user attacks and captures opposing Pokémon
using an electric net. This lowers their Speed stat.

bulldoze.name: bulldoze
bulldoze.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to lower the target's Speed by one stage.
bulldoze.flavorText:
The user strikes everything around it by stomping
down on the ground. This lowers the Speed stat of
those hit.

grassPledge.name: grassPledge
grassPledge.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  If a friendly Pokémon used fire pledge earlier this turn, all opposing Pokémon will take 1/8 their max HP in damage at the end of every turn for four turns (including this one).
grassPledge.flavorText:
A column of grass hits the target. When used with
its water equivalent, its power increases and a vast
swamp appears.

cottonGuard.name: cottonGuard
cottonGuard.effectText: Raises the user's Defense by three stages.
cottonGuard.flavorText:
The user protects itself by wrapping its body in soft
cotton, which drastically raises the user’s
Defense stat.

workUp.name: workUp
workUp.effectText: Raises the user's Attack and Special Attack by one stage each.
workUp.flavorText:
The user is roused, and its Attack and Sp. Atk
stats increase.

sacredSword.name: sacredSword
sacredSword.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Damage calculation ignores the target's stat modifiers, including evasion.
sacredSword.flavorText:
The user attacks by slicing with a long horn. The
target’s stat changes don’t affect this
attack’s damage.

gearGrind.name: gearGrind
gearGrind.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Hits twice in one turn.
gearGrind.flavorText:
The user attacks by throwing steel gears at its
target twice.

tailSlap.name: tailSlap
tailSlap.effectText:
Inflicts regular damage.  Hits 2–5 times in one turn.

Has a 3/8 chance each to hit 2 or 3 times, and a 1/8 chance each to hit 4 or 5 times.  Averages to 3 hits per use.
tailSlap.flavorText:
The user attacks by striking the target with its hard
tail. It hits the target two to five times in a row.

drillRun.name: drillRun
drillRun.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  User's critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move.
drillRun.flavorText:
The user crashes into its target while rotating its
body like a drill. Critical hits land more easily.

razorShell.name: razorShell
razorShell.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to lower the target's Defense by one stage.
razorShell.flavorText:
The user cuts its target with sharp shells. This may
also lower the target’s Defense stat.

hurricane.name: hurricane
hurricane.effectText:
Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to confuse the target.

This move can hit Pokémon under the effect of bounce, fly, or sky drop.

During rain dance, this move has 100% accuracy.  During sunny day, this move has 50% accuracy.
hurricane.flavorText:
The user attacks by wrapping its opponent in a
fierce wind that flies up into the sky. This may also
confuse the target.

nightDaze.name: nightDaze
nightDaze.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to lower the target's accuracy by one stage.
nightDaze.flavorText:
The user lets loose a pitch-black shock wave at its
target. This may also lower the target’s accuracy.

psystrike.name: psystrike
psystrike.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Damage calculation always uses the target's Defense, regardless of this move's damage class.
psystrike.flavorText:
The user materializes an odd psychic wave to attack
the target. This attack does physical damage.

headCharge.name: headCharge
headCharge.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  User takes 1/4 the damage it inflicts in recoil.
headCharge.flavorText:
The user charges its head into its target, using its
powerful guard hair. This also damages the user
a little.

snarl.name: snarl
snarl.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to lower the target's Special Attack by one stage.
snarl.flavorText:
The user yells as if it’s ranting about something,
which lowers the Sp. Atk stat of opposing Pokémon.

icicleCrash.name: icicleCrash
icicleCrash.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to make the target flinch.
icicleCrash.flavorText:
The user attacks by harshly dropping large icicles
onto the target. This may also make the target flinch.

iceBurn.name: iceBurn
iceBurn.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to burn the target.  User charges for one turn before attacking.
iceBurn.flavorText:
On the second turn, an ultracold, freezing wind
surrounds the target. This may leave the target with
a burn.

blueFlare.name: blueFlare
blueFlare.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to burn the target.
blueFlare.flavorText:
The user attacks by engulfing the target in an
intense, yet beautiful, blue flame. This may also leave
the target with a burn.

freezeShock.name: freezeShock
freezeShock.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to paralyze the target.  User charges for one turn before attacking.
freezeShock.flavorText:
On the second turn, the user hits the target with
electrically charged ice. This may also leave the
target with paralysis.

boltStrike.name: boltStrike
boltStrike.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to paralyze the target.
boltStrike.flavorText:
The user surrounds itself with a great amount of
electricity and charges its target. This may also
leave the target with paralysis.

technoBlast.name: technoBlast
technoBlast.effectText:
Inflicts regular damage.  If the user is holding a plate or a drive, this move's type is the type corresponding to that item.

Note: This effect is technically shared by both techno blast and judgment; however, Techno Blast is only affected by drives, and Judgment is only affected by plates.
technoBlast.flavorText:
The user fires a beam of light at its target. The
move’s type changes depending on the Drive the
user holds.

searingShot.name: searingShot
searingShot.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to burn the target.
searingShot.flavorText:
The user torches everything around it in an inferno
of scarlet flames. This may also leave those it hits
with a burn.

glaciate.name: glaciate
glaciate.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Lowers the target's Speed by one stage.
glaciate.flavorText:
The user attacks by blowing freezing cold air at
opposing Pokémon. This lowers their Speed stat.

secretSword.name: secretSword
secretSword.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Damage calculation always uses the target's Defense, regardless of this move's damage class.
secretSword.flavorText:
The user cuts with its long horn. The odd power
contained in the horn does physical damage to
the target.

relicSong.name: relicSong
relicSong.effectText:
Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to put the target to sleep.
If the user is a meloetta, it will toggle between Aria and Pirouette Forme.
relicSong.flavorText:
The user sings an ancient song and attacks by
appealing to the hearts of the listening opposing
Pokémon. This may also induce sleep.

vCreate.name: vCreate
vCreate.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Lowers the user's Defense, Special Defense, and Speed by one stage each.
vCreate.flavorText:
With a hot flame on its forehead, the user hurls itself
at its target. This lowers the user’s Defense, Sp. Def,
and Speed stats.

fusionBolt.name: fusionBolt
fusionBolt.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  If a friendly Pokémon used fusion flare earlier this turn, this move has double power.
fusionBolt.flavorText:
The user throws down a giant lightning bolt. This
move’s power is increased when influenced by an
enormous flame.

stickyWeb.name: stickyWeb
stickyWeb.effectText:
Shoots a web over the opponents' side of the field, which lowers the Speed of any opposing Pokémon that enters the field by one stage.

Pokémon in the air, such as flying-types and those with levitate, are unaffected.  rapid spin removes Sticky Web from the user's side of the field; defog removes it from both sides.
stickyWeb.flavorText:
The user weaves a sticky net around the opposing
team, which lowers their Speed stat upon switching
into battle.

phantomForce.name: phantomForce
phantomForce.effectText:
Inflicts regular damage.  User vanishes for one turn, becoming immune to attack, and hits on the second turn.

This move ignores the effects of detect and protect.

This move cannot be selected by sleep talk.
phantomForce.flavorText:
The user vanishes somewhere, then strikes the
target on the next turn. This move hits even if the
target protects itself.

belch.name: belch
belch.effectText:
Inflicts regular damage.  Can only be used if the user has eaten a berry since the beginning of the battle.

After the user eats a berry, it may use this move any number of times until the end of the battle, even if it switches out.  Eating a held berry, eating a berry via bug bite or pluck, or being the target of a Flung berry will enable this move.  Feeding a Pokémon a berry from the bag or using natural gift will not.

If the trainer chooses this move when it cannot be used, the choice is rejected outright and the trainer must choose another move.
belch.flavorText:
The user lets out a damaging belch at the target.
The user must eat a held Berry to use this move.

flyingPress.name: flyingPress
flyingPress.effectText:
Inflicts regular damage.  For the purposes of type effectiveness, this move is both fighting- and flying-type: its final effectiveness is determined by multiplying the effectiveness of each type against each of the target's types.

For all other purposes, this move is pure Fighting-type.  If this move's type is changed, its Fighting typing is overwritten, and its secondary type remains Flying.

If the target has used minimize since entering battle, this move has double power and will never miss.
flyingPress.flavorText:
The user dives down onto the target from the sky.
This move is Fighting and Flying type simultaneously.

fellStinger.name: fellStinger
fellStinger.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Raises the user's Attack by two stages if it KOs the target.
fellStinger.flavorText:
When the user knocks out a target with this move,
the user’s Attack stat rises drastically.

celebrate.name: celebrate
celebrate.flavorText: The Pokémon congratulates you on your special day!

nobleRoar.name: nobleRoar
nobleRoar.effectText: Lowers the target's Attack and Special Attack by one stage.
nobleRoar.flavorText:
Letting out a noble roar, the user intimidates the
target and lowers its Attack and Sp. Atk stats.

matBlock.name: matBlock
matBlock.effectText: Protects all friendly Pokémon from damaging moves.  Only works on the first turn after the user is sent out.
matBlock.flavorText:
Using a pulled-up mat as a shield, the user protects
itself and its allies from damaging moves. This does
not stop status moves.

trickOrTreat.name: trickOrTreat
trickOrTreat.effectText: Adds ghost to the target's types.
trickOrTreat.flavorText:
The user takes the target trick-or-treating.
This adds Ghost type to the target’s type.

fusionFlare.name: fusionFlare
fusionFlare.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  If a friendly Pokémon used fusion bolt earlier this turn, this move has double power.
fusionFlare.flavorText:
The user brings down a giant flame. This move’s
power is increased when influenced by an enormous
lightning bolt.

rototiller.name: rototiller
rototiller.effectText: Raises the Attack and Special Attack of all grass Pokémon in battle.
rototiller.flavorText:
Tilling the soil, the user makes it easier for plants to
grow. This raises the Attack and Sp. Atk stats of
Grass-type Pokémon.

holdBack.name: holdBack
holdBack.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Will not reduce the target's HP below 1.
holdBack.flavorText:
The user holds back when it attacks, and the target
is left with at least 1 HP.

petalBlizzard.name: petalBlizzard
petalBlizzard.flavorText:
The user stirs up a violent petal blizzard and attacks
everything around it.

drainingKiss.name: drainingKiss
drainingKiss.effectText: Deals regular damage.  Drains 75% of the damage inflicted to heal the user.
drainingKiss.flavorText:
The user steals the target’s HP with a kiss. The
user’s HP is restored by over half of the damage
taken by the target.

freezeDry.name: freezeDry
freezeDry.effectText:
Inflicts regular damage.  This move is super-effective against the water type.

The target's other type will affect damage as usual.  If this move's type is changed, it remains super-effective against Water regardless of its type.
freezeDry.flavorText:
The user rapidly cools the target. This may also
leave the target frozen. This move is super effective
on Water types.

mistyTerrain.name: mistyTerrain
mistyTerrain.effectText:
For five turns, protects all Pokémon on the ground from major status ailments and confusion and weakens dragon moves used against them to 0.5× their power.

Changes nature power to moonblast.
mistyTerrain.flavorText:
This protects Pokémon on the ground from status
conditions and halves damage from Dragon-type
moves for five turns.

parabolicCharge.name: parabolicCharge
parabolicCharge.effectText: Heals the user for half the total damage dealt to all targets.
parabolicCharge.flavorText:
The user attacks everything around it. The user’s HP
is restored by half the damage taken by those hit.

partingShot.name: partingShot
partingShot.effectText: Lowers all targets' Attack and Special Attack by one stage.  Makes the user switch out.
partingShot.flavorText:
With a parting threat, the user lowers the target’s
Attack and Sp. Atk stats. Then it switches with a
party Pokémon.

fairyLock.name: fairyLock
fairyLock.effectText: Prevents all Pokémon from fleeing or switching out during the next turn.
fairyLock.flavorText:
By locking down the battlefield, the user keeps all
Pokémon from fleeing during the next turn.

geomancy.name: geomancy
geomancy.effectText: Takes one turn to charge, then raises the user's Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by two stages.
geomancy.flavorText:
The user absorbs energy and sharply raises its
Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and Speed stats on the next turn.

oblivionWing.name: oblivionWing
oblivionWing.effectText: Deals regular damage.  Drains 75% of the damage inflicted to heal the user.
oblivionWing.flavorText:
The user absorbs its target’s HP. The user’s HP is
restored by over half of the damage taken by
the target.

topsyTurvy.name: topsyTurvy
topsyTurvy.flavorText:
All stat changes affecting the target turn
topsy-turvy and become the opposite of what
they were.

grassyTerrain.name: grassyTerrain
grassyTerrain.effectText:
For five turns, heals all Pokémon on the ground for 1/16 their max HP each turn and strengthens their grass moves to 1.5× their power.

Changes nature power to energy ball.
grassyTerrain.flavorText:
The user turns the ground to grass for five turns.
This restores the HP of Pokémon on the ground a
little every turn and powers up Grass type-moves.

flowerShield.name: flowerShield
flowerShield.effectText: Raises the Defense of all grass Pokémon in battle.
flowerShield.flavorText:
The user raises the Defense stat of all Grass-type
Pokémon in battle with a mysterious power.

steamEruption.name: steamEruption
steamEruption.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to burn the target.
steamEruption.flavorText:
The user immerses the target in superheated steam.
This may also leave the target with a burn.

kingsShield.name: kingsShield
kingsShield.effectText: Blocks damaging attacks and lowers attacking Pokémon's Attack by two stages on contact.  Switches Aegislash to Shield Forme.
kingsShield.flavorText:
The user takes a defensive stance while it protects
itself from damage. It also harshly lowers the Attack
stat of any attacker who makes direct contact.

powerUpPunch.name: powerUpPunch
powerUpPunch.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Raises the user's Attack by one stage.
powerUpPunch.flavorText:
Striking opponents over and over makes the user’s
fists harder. Hitting a target raises the Attack stat.

eerieImpulse.name: eerieImpulse
eerieImpulse.effectText: Lowers the target's Special Attack by two stages.
eerieImpulse.flavorText:
The user’s body generates an eerie impulse.
Exposing the target to it harshly lowers the target’s
Sp. Atk stat.

magneticFlux.name: magneticFlux
magneticFlux.effectText: Raises the Defense and Special Defense of all friendly Pokémon with plus or minus by one stage.
magneticFlux.flavorText:
The user manipulates magnetic fields, which raises
the Defense and Sp. Def stats of ally Pokémon with
the Plus or Minus Ability.

holdHands.name: holdHands
holdHands.flavorText:
The user and an ally hold hands. This makes them
very happy.

babyDollEyes.name: babyDollEyes
babyDollEyes.effectText: Lowers the target's Attack by one stage.
babyDollEyes.flavorText:
The user stares at the target with its baby-doll
eyes, which lowers its Attack stat. This move always
goes first.

disarmingVoice.name: disarmingVoice
disarmingVoice.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Ignores accuracy and evasion.
disarmingVoice.flavorText:
Letting out a charming cry, the user does emotional
damage to opposing Pokémon. This attack
never misses.

forestsCurse.name: forestsCurse
forestsCurse.effectText: Adds grass to the target's types.
forestsCurse.flavorText:
The user puts a forest curse on the target.
The target is now Grass type as well.

ionDeluge.name: ionDeluge
ionDeluge.effectText: Changes all Pokémon's normal moves to electric moves for the rest of the turn.
ionDeluge.flavorText:
The user disperses electrically charged particles,
which changes Normal-type moves to
Electric-type moves.

playRough.name: playRough
playRough.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to lower the target's Attack by one stage.
playRough.flavorText:
The user plays rough with the target and attacks it.
This may also lower the target’s Attack stat.

craftyShield.name: craftyShield
craftyShield.effectText:
Protects all friendly Pokémon from non-damaging moves for the rest of the turn.

Unlike other blocking moves, this move may be used consecutively without its chance of success falling.
craftyShield.flavorText:
The user protects itself and its allies from status
moves with a mysterious power. This does not stop
moves that do damage.

electrify.name: electrify
electrify.effectText: Changes the target's move's type to electric if it hasn't moved yet this turn.
electrify.flavorText:
If the target is electrified before it uses a move
during that turn, the target’s move becomes
Electric type.

diamondStorm.name: diamondStorm
diamondStorm.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to raise the user's Defense by two stages for each target hit.
diamondStorm.flavorText:
The user whips up a storm of diamonds to damage
opposing Pokémon. This may also sharply raise the
user’s Defense stat.

powder.name: powder
powder.effectText: Explodes if the target uses a fire move this turn, damaging it for 1/4 its max HP and preventing the move.
powder.flavorText:
The user covers the target in a combustible powder.
If the target uses a Fire-type move, the powder
explodes and damages the target.

venomDrench.name: venomDrench
venomDrench.effectText: Lowers the target's Attack, Special Attack, and Speed by one stage if it is poisoned.
venomDrench.flavorText:
Opposing Pokémon are drenched in an odd
poisonous liquid. This lowers the Attack, Sp. Atk, and
Speed stats of a poisoned target.

electricTerrain.name: electricTerrain
electricTerrain.effectText:
For five turns, prevents all Pokémon on the ground from sleeping and strengthens their electric moves to 1.5× their power.

Changes nature power to thunderbolt.
electricTerrain.flavorText:
The user electrifies the ground for five turns,
powering up Electric-type moves. Pokémon on the
ground no longer fall asleep.

spikyShield.name: spikyShield
spikyShield.effectText: Blocks damaging attacks and damages attacking Pokémon for 1/8 their max HP.
spikyShield.flavorText:
In addition to protecting the user from attacks, this
move also damages any attacker who makes
direct contact.

hyperspaceHole.name: hyperspaceHole
hyperspaceHole.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Bypasses and removes any protection effect on the target.
hyperspaceHole.flavorText:
Using a hyperspace hole, the user appears right
next to the target and strikes. This also hits a target
using a move such as Protect or Detect.

playNice.name: playNice
playNice.effectText: Lowers the target's Attack by one stage.
playNice.flavorText:
The user and the target become friends, and the
target loses its will to fight. This lowers the target’s
Attack stat.

waterShuriken.name: waterShuriken
waterShuriken.flavorText:
The user hits the target with throwing stars two to
five times in a row. This move always goes first.

mysticalFire.name: mysticalFire
mysticalFire.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to lower the target's Special Attack by one stage.
mysticalFire.flavorText:
The user attacks by breathing a special, hot fire.
This also lowers the target’s Sp. Atk stat.

aromaticMist.name: aromaticMist
aromaticMist.effectText: Raises a selected ally's Special Defense by one stage.
aromaticMist.flavorText:
The user raises the Sp. Def stat of an ally Pokémon
by using a mysterious aroma.

confide.name: confide
confide.effectText: Lowers the target's Special Attack by one stage.
confide.flavorText:
The user tells the target a secret, and the target
loses its ability to concentrate. This lowers
the target’s Sp. Atk stat.

boomburst.name: boomburst
boomburst.flavorText:
The user attacks everything around it with the
destructive power of a terrible, explosive sound.

fairyWind.name: fairyWind
fairyWind.flavorText:
The user stirs up a fairy wind and strikes the target
with it.

moonblast.name: moonblast
moonblast.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to lower the target's Special Attack by one stage.
moonblast.flavorText:
Borrowing the power of the moon, the user attacks
the target. This may also lower the target’s
Sp. Atk stat.

hyperspaceFury.name: hyperspaceFury
hyperspaceFury.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Bypasses and removes any protection effect on the target.
hyperspaceFury.flavorText:
Using its many arms, the user unleashes a barrage of
attacks that ignore the effects of moves like Protect
and Detect. But the user’s Defense stat falls.

dazzlingGleam.name: dazzlingGleam
dazzlingGleam.flavorText:
The user damages opposing Pokémon by emitting a
powerful flash.

precipiceBlades.name: precipiceBlades
precipiceBlades.flavorText:
The user attacks opposing Pokémon by manifesting
the power of the land in fearsome blades of stone.

thousandArrows.name: thousandArrows
thousandArrows.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Grounds the target until it leaves battle.  Ignores levitation effects and the immunity of flying-type Pokémon.
thousandArrows.flavorText:
This move also hits opposing Pokémon that are in
the air. Those Pokémon are knocked down to
the ground.

happyHour.name: happyHour
happyHour.effectText:
Doubles prize money.

Stacks with a held item.  Only works once per battle.
happyHour.flavorText:
Using Happy Hour doubles the amount of prize
money received after battle.

nuzzle.name: nuzzle
nuzzle.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effectChance% chance to paralyze the target.
nuzzle.flavorText:
The user attacks by nuzzling its electrified cheeks
against the target. This also leaves the target
with paralysis.

landsWrath.name: landsWrath
landsWrath.flavorText:
The user gathers the energy of the land and focuses
that power on opposing Pokémon to damage them.

dragonAscent.name: dragonAscent
dragonAscent.effectText: Inflicts regular damage, then lowers the user's Defense and Special Defense by one stage each.
dragonAscent.flavorText:
After soaring upward, the user attacks its target by
dropping out of the sky at high speeds. But it lowers
its own Defense and Sp. Def stats in the process.

infestation.name: infestation
infestation.effectText:
Inflicts regular damage.  For the next 2–5 turns, the target cannot leave the field and is damaged for 1/16 its max HP at the end of each turn.  The user continues to use other moves during this time.  If the user leaves the field, this effect ends.

Has a 3/8 chance each to hit 2 or 3 times, and a 1/8 chance each to hit 4 or 5 times.  Averages to 3 hits per use.

rapid spin cancels this effect.
infestation.flavorText:
The target is infested and attacked for four to five
turns. The target can’t flee during this time.

thousandWaves.name: thousandWaves
thousandWaves.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  Traps the target.
thousandWaves.flavorText:
The user attacks with a wave that crawls along the
ground. Those hit can’t flee from battle.

originPulse.name: originPulse
originPulse.flavorText:
The user attacks opposing Pokémon with countless
beams of light that glow a deep and brilliant blue.

lightOfRuin.name: lightOfRuin
lightOfRuin.effectText: Inflicts regular damage.  User takes 1/2 the damage it inflicts in recoil.
lightOfRuin.flavorText:
Drawing power from the Eternal Flower, the user
fires a powerful beam of light. This also damages the
user quite a lot.
